Su principal sueño es darle a su hija una mejor calidad de vida, que siga estudiando en la universidad y que crezca viendo a su madre progresar y salir adelante con sus dos negocios. 
Como ya se habia mencionado, la señora Ana ha utilizado varias veces los micro créditos para consolidar sus dos locales y vuelve a solicitar este apoyo, pues necesita surtir su micro empresa, puesto que los gastos que le generan su hogar y su hija no le alcanzan para mantener el negocio como ella quiere; y es que no es una persona conformista que vende solo lo que tiene, quiere darle a su clientes todo lo mejor y lo que necesiten y es ésta una labor de admirar, una persona que se preocupa por sus clientes ya que sabe que éstos son su razón de ser y tiene mucho que agradecerles por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Ana is a woman who, thanks to the micro-loans, has been able to establish two businesses—a store, and a hair salon. Her family considers her to be a woman who is very brave, a woman with fighting spirit who meets the challenges that face her. Her main goal is to give her daughter a better quality of life, so that she can continue studying at the university and grow up seeing her mother move forward single-handedly with her two businesses.

As mentioned above, Señora Ana has utilized the micro-loans several times in order to strengthen her two businesses, and she is returning to seek this support, as she needs to stock her small store. Because of her household expenses and those of her daughter, she is not able to maintain the business in the way that she would like, as she is not a person who settles for only selling what she has—she wants to provide her customers with everything that they might need. 

Her service is excellent because she is a person who worries about her customers, as she knows that they are the reason for her existence. The loan would support this woman who is a fighter in life.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant 1200 cacao seedlings on four acres

loans.name: Maelewano Zomboko Group

texts.en:
Elina was born in the late 1960s and is a widow. She is the mother of two sons and two daughters, one of whom is at school. For the past twenty years Elina has made a living running a shop where she sells soft drinks and beer. Her shop is open from 9:00 a.m. to midnight, and from this she is able to make a fair monthly profit.

Elina is one of the six-member group Maelewano Zomboko. The group takes a loan, then holds each other accountable for paying it back. On their behalf she is requesting a 6,350,000 TZS loan, her twentieth, through Kiva partner Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans, all paid back successfully, to restock her shop with popular drinks for her customers.

With her profits Elina has paid for household expenses. She is also happy and proud that with Kiva's support she has been able to pay college fees for one of her children. In the coming years she looks forward to improving her life and business.

loans.use: to restock drinks for her shop.

loans.name: Maisha Zakhem Group

texts.en:
Daima, who is in her late fourties, is married with five children who are still in school. She has been running several projects; selling kitchen utensils, selling charcoal and fruits for 20 years now.  She works from 6 am to 10 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Daima's 20th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans buy better types of kitchen utensils, more sacks of charcoal and started selling fruits.  She has paid back all her loans successfully.  She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva's support.  She used the profit to pay school fees, started building another house and covered household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy up-to-date kitchen utensils,  more sacks of charcoal and fruits to resell. She dreams of having a big charcoal store.

Daima will share this loan with her loan group "Maisha Zakhem" which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date kitchen utensils, more sacks of charcoal and fruits to resell.

loans.name: Heybi Yamileth

texts.es:
La señora Heybi Yamileth de 28  años de edad es soltera, no  tiene  hijos  que dependen de ella, radica en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, Valle al sur de Honduras, Heybi no tiene casa propia, vive en casa de un familiar   y se dedica desde hace 2 años a la actividad de venta de golosinas en su negocio ella vende tacos, enchiladas, pastelitos, tajadas, frescos natural y de botella, Ella es una joven mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante.
Heybi está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de frescos de botellas, frutas, carnes, maseca, leña, aceite, y otros productos para hacer sus golosinas. Con el apoyo del crédito ella mejorara su negocio y tendrá mejores ganancias y por ende mejorara su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Heybi es algún día tener un restaurante.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2014.
texts.en:
Heybi Yamileth, 28 years old, is single and has no dependent children. She lives in the community of San Lorenzo, Valle, in the south of Honduras. Heybi does not have her own house; she lives in a relative's home. She has worked for the past two years selling treats. In her business she sells tacos, enchiladas, pastries, fried plantains, and natural and bottled juices and soft drinks. She is a young and hardworking woman with dreams of doing well for herself. 

Heybi is requesting this loan to buy to buy bottled soft drinks, fruit, meat, corn flour, firewood, oil, and other products to make her treats. With the help of the loan, she will improve her business, make more money, and in the end improve her quality of life. Heybi's dream is to one day have a restaurant.

San Lorenzo, Honduras-- March 2014

loans.use: to buy bottled soft drinks, fruit, meat, corn flour, firewood, oil, and other products to make her treats

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, ella se dedica a la venta de extinguidores y botiquines y ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar extiguidores y botiquines. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Luz Marina lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, in the south of Peru. She belongs to the communal borrowing group "Qory Chaska" of the UMF Arariwa. She sells fire extinguishers and first aid kits, which she has been doing for some years now, and which is going quite well for her.

She currently needs the loan to buy fire extinguishers and first aid kits. She is grateful for the loan and commits to making her established payments.

loans.use: to buy fire extinguishers and first aid kits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers, bags and clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Dinora

texts.es: Dinora vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, ella se dedica a la revelar fotografías y ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar papel fotográfico. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Dinora lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, in the south of Peru, and she is a member of the communal bank "Qory Chaska" of the UMF Arariwa. She develops photographs, which she has been doing for several years and which is going quite well for her. 

She currently needs a loan to buy photographic paper. She is grateful for the loan and commits to making her established payments.

loans.use: to buy photographic paper

loans.name: Bernardino

texts.es: Bernardino vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, él se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su propio taxi y ya son varios años que se dedica a este servicio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Bernardino lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the sourth of Perú and belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Qory Chaska" communal bank.  He earns his living providing transportation services in his own taxi.  He's been in business for a number of years and it is going very well.  At this time he needs a loan to do maintenance on his car.  He is grateful for the loan and promises to make all the required payments.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, ella se dedica a la revelar fotografías y ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar papel fotográfico. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Martha lives in the lovely city of Cusco in the south of Perú and belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Qory Chaska" communal bank.  She has made her living developing photos for a number of years and it's going very well.  She currently needs a loan to buy photo paper.  She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy photographic paper.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta de 54 años de edad, vive con sus 2 hijos de 20 y 23 años de edad, los dos no estudian solo le ayudan a trabajar en la milpa, ya que actualmente cultivan granos básicos y agroindustriales como la caña de azúcar.

Marta una señora trabajadora y dedicada totalmente a su familia, se dedica a la agricultura, ya que esto ha heredado de generación en generación. Pero, además de cultivar granos básicos, también cultiva caña de azúcar de donde extrae el jugo, luego le da el proceso de cocción, se pasa al molde y después de 30 minutos se obtiene el producto final llamado “atado de dulce” que es un sustituto de los azucares empacados de las compañías azucareras.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 6 quintales de urea, 4 quintales de sulfato para fertilizar el Maíz en su primera y segunda etapa, y además comprara 1 camionada de gallinaza para combinar con el fertilizante, con esta técnica podrá darle un buen manejo al cultivo mejorando su producción y así poder tener más ingresos y también poder sacar sus granos básicos para darles una buena alimentación a sus hijos. 

Marta quiere seguir produciendo granos básicos y le apostara también a la caña de azúcar, ya que es una fuente de ingreso muy buena.
texts.en:
Marta is 54 years old, and lives with her two 20 and 23 year old children.  Neither of her children attend school, but they help her work in the field since they grow basic grains and agroindustrial products life sugarcane. Marta is a hardworking woman who is devoted to her family. She works in agriculture, as it has been passed down from generation to generation. In addition to growing basic grains, she also grows sugarcane from which she extracts the juice, cooks it and places it in a mold for 30 minutes to obtain the final product which is called "atado de dulce" (panela), and is used as a substitute to packaged sugar from the sugar companies.  

The loan that she is seeking will be used to purchase 6 quintals of urea and 4 quintals of sulfate to fertilize the corn in its first and second stages, as well as to purchase 1 truckload do manure to combine with the fertilizer.  Through this, she will be able to better care for her crops and improve her production, which will allow her to generate greater earnings and be able to harvest her basic grains to feed her children.  Marta wants to continue producing basic grains and sugar cane since it is a very good source of income.

loans.use: 6 quintals of urea and 4 quintals of sulfate to fertilize the corn in its first and second stages, as well as purchase 1 truckload of manure to combine with the fertilizer.

loans.name: José Manuel Orlando

texts.es:
José de 40 años de edad, vive con sus 3 hijos de edades entre 6 y 14 años, 2 le ayudan a trabajar en la milpa, ya que el otro esta pequeño, actualmente no estudian porque les queda demasiado lejos ir a la escuela y su compañera de vida que se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

José es un hombre trabajador y dedicado totalmente a su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 10 años, trabajando al lado de su padre que fue quien le enseño a cultivar la tierra, aparte de cultivar la tierra, José sabe trabajar de electricista y eso le ayuda a mejorar sus ingresos para darle una buena alimentación a su familia. Los insumos agrícolas los cotiza en varios agroservicios de y los traslada en carro hasta la entrada del caserío y de allí le toca cargar por la montaña hasta su casa haciendo un tiempo aproximado de 30 minutos caminando. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 2 quintales de urea, 3 quintales de sulfato y 15 quintales de gallinaza para hacer mezcla de sulfato con gallinaza, para fertilizar el maíz en su primera y segunda etapa, con esta técnica podrá darle un buen manejo al cultivo mejorando su producción y así poder tener más ingresos y también poder sacar sus granos básicos para darles una buena alimentación a sus hijos. 

José en un futuro quiere construir una casa nueva, para que sus hijos tengan un lugar más sano donde divertirse y sus futuras generaciones tengan mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is 40 years old and lives with his life partner and 3 children who range from 6 to 14 years old. Two of them help in the corn fields, but the other one is too young. They are not currently in school because the school is too far away. His partner is a housewife.

José is a hard worker and is totally devoted to his family.  He has been a farmer since he was 10 years old, working beside his father who taught him how to work the land. In addition to farming, Jose is an electrician and this helps to add to his income and feed his family well. 

He gets quotes for his farming supplies from various farm supply services and he transports them by car to the entrance to his village.  From there he must carry the supplies up the mountain to his house which takes about 30 minutes by foot. 

The loan he is requesting is so that he can buy 2 quintals of urea, 3 quintals of sulphate, and 15 quintals of hen manure. He makes a mixture of the sulphate and hen manure to fertilize the corn in its first and second stages, and with this technique he is able to manage his crop well and get good output, resulting in more income. It is also a source of basic grains and good food for his children. 

In the future Jose hopes to build a new house so that his children will have a healthier place to live and enjoy themselves, and so that future generations will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy 2 quintals of urea, 3 quintals of sulphate, and 15 quintals of hen manure to fertilize his corn in its first and second stages.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Gregorio is a veteran cacao farmer, who was raised by his father who also farmed cacao. 

He lives in a beautiful, cacao farming village in the Toledo District of southern Belize.  Gregorio also works with other agricultural products like corn, beans and vegetables -- however his main passion is cacao farming. 

Gregorio would like a loan to clean and maintain his farm, so he can increase his production.  

He would like to use the resources generated from this loan to ultimately educate his children and support them in their efforts to become professional, large-scale cacao farmers.

loans.use: to clean and maintain his farm.

loans.name: Fatia

texts.en:
Fatia has three children and is happily married.  

She rears animals and is also a farmer, on  small scale.  Her major challenge is limited capital.  However, Fatia is confident that access to financial services from Ugafode will solve her challenge.  Fatia is determined and hard working.

loans.use: to buy goats and better seeds for planting.

loans.name: Alanberto

texts.en:
Alanberto is a young farmer who has three children. He lives in a beautiful village in southern Belize, and currently plants rice on his land. 

He is very excited about expanding his crop selection, and that is why he is applying for a loan. With this loan, Alanberto will invest in cleaning and maintaining his farm, so that he can increase his cacao production.

Alanberto plans to use the resources generated by selling more cacao to send his children to school, to help ensure a better future for them.

loans.use: to clean and maintain his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help and clean up her coffee crops

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant, maintain and clean his cacao farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To clean his 1200 cacao trees.

loans.name: Noel

texts.en:
Noel is a small entrepeneur and Kubo Financiero’s client, and this is his story:

Noel is 46 years old, is married and has three children. He lives in a house he owns and has a tailor shop located inside his place. There, he works on clothing producing for companies who are his clients and any general composure for clothes.

He considers himself as a good subject for credit, given that he is responsible and conscious of his debts and obligations. He asks for this loan to invest in merchandise for business, especially cloth, and to make some necessary improvements in his house. 

Noel has accomplished the goal for his shop to be bigger every day and to attend more orders. His challenges are to buy more machinery in order to produce more and employ more people in the future.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, especially cloth, for his business.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, él se dedica a la venta de ropa como por ejemplo camisas, blusas, chompas, pantalones, polos y otras cosas mas y ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo pantalones y blusas para esta campaña por el día de la madre. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
William lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the south of Peru and belongs to the "Qory Chaska" communal bank of the Arariwa microfinance organisation. He makes a living selling clothing such as shirts, blouses, jumpers, trousers, t-shirts and other items. He has been working in this business for several years now and it is going well for him.

On this occasion he needs the loan to buy merchandise such as trousers and blouses for the Mothers Day sales period. He is grateful for the loan provided and promises to meet his agreed payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as trousers and blouses.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: María tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 4 años de edad. María  se dedica a la venta de medicina natural y variedad de vitaminas. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace 6 años y ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Este negocio es muy importante para María y su familia dado que con los ingresos que percibe de su negocio le ayuda a complementar y cubrir las necesidades del hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercadería para incrementar su inventario de venta de vitaminas y medicina natural dado que desea abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado que le permita aumentar las ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 38 years old and lives in her own home with her spouse and four year old daughter. She makes a living selling natural medicine and vitamins. Maria has been making her sales on foot for six years. She now has many customers and is growing each day. This business is very important for Maria and her family because the income made from the business helps her to complement her household expenses. 

With the purpose of improving her and her family's living conditions, she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in her business by purchasing the merchandise needed to increase her inventory for her natural medicine and vitamin sales. She hopes to take on a greater share of the market so that she can increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy natural medicine and vitamins for her business.

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.es: Yesenia vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, ella se dedica a la revelar fotografías y ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar papel fotográfico. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Yesenia lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the south of Peru and belongs to the Arariwa microfinance organization's "Qory Chaska" communal bank. She makes a living developing photos. She has been in this business for several years and it is going well for her.

On this occasion she needs the loan to buy photographic paper.

She is grateful for the loan provided and promises to make her agreed payments.

loans.use: to buy photographic paper.

loans.name: Tejedoras De Panimatzalam Group

texts.en:
Panimatzalam is a rural community with a very small population in the state of Sololá in the Western Highlands of Guatemala. As the soil is quite fertile, most of the population works in agriculture producing snow peas, brocoli, tomatoes, and corn. 

The Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Mujeres Las Tejedoras de Panimatzalam” is located here and is made up of seven women who are requesting a new loan. Most of the women work in agricultural endeavors and a few are involved in textile production, creating some of the beautiful, traditional clothing of the area. The ladies have an average of six years of education.

Mirna is a 27-year-old single member of the Trust Bank who studies in the university. She is motivated to work hard as her goal is to complete her studies within a short period of time. Mirna wants to improve her quality of life and is requesting a loan which she will invest in corn seed, fertilizer, and insecticides as well as the purchase of some laying hens so that she can sell eggs in her community.

At the monthly meetings of the Trust Bank, a Friendship Bridge Loan Officer conducts educational trainings on relevant and useful subjects. The women are eager to learn about effective business practices including accounting and budgeting. They also learn about health, native plants, and nutrition. 

This will be the first loan cycle for the Trust Bank and the women are very excited and enthusiastic about this big step that they are about to take! They feel that they have the energy and perseverance to improve their personal and business lives. The ladies are so happy and hopeful for a better future for themselves, their families and their community. They have made a promise to be responsible and pay back their loans. Each of the women extends their heartfelt thanks to KIVA investors for believing in them and providing the capital for their loans!

loans.use: To invest in corn seed, fertilizer, and insecticides

loans.name: Pilar

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Pilar con su anterior credikiva mediante el cual compró una máquina industrial, y una para pegar broches. Con su credikiva mejoró la calidad de sus productos y los tiempos productivos. Hoy está aplicando aun nuevo credikiva, mediante el cual comprará una máquina fileteadora, para mejorar el acabado de la prenda y para realizar dos funciones al mismo tiempo aumentando su capacidad productiva. Desde que recibió su anterior crédito, su infraestructura mejoró y la entrega de los trabajos aumenta la calidad de vida por tener mejores ingresos.  En su  mensaje de agradecimiento a los  financiadores de  Kiva, pide que la sigan apoyando. Pilar se muestra muy feliz con todo lo que en su negocio está pasando.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Pilar with her previous Kiva loan that was used to purchase an industrial sewing machine and a machine to glue clasps. With the previous loan, she was able to improve the quality of her products and her efficiency. Today, she is applying for a new Kiva loan that will be used to purchase an overlock sewing machine to improve the finish of her garments and to be able to perform two tasks at once, improving her production capabilities. 

Since receiving her previous loan, her infrastructure has improved, and delivering more orders has improved her quality of life through her increased income.  In her message of gratitude to the Kiva lenders, she asks that they continue to support her.  Pilar is very happy for everything that has been going on with her business.

loans.use: purchase an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Nora

texts.en: Nora is 47 years old. She is married with four children. She has been selling sugar, salt and biscuits for the past two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, rice and soap to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand the inventory.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, rice and soap to sell

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis de 34 años de edad es el propietario de un café internet, ubicado al sur occidente de la ciudad donde habita con su familia y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 3 a 9 años. En su negocio hace 3 años,  ofrece servicios de fotocopiajes, scanner, transcripciones y venta de minutos a celulares.  Su negocio indicó entusiasmado con poner en práctica lo aprendido en el Servicio nacional de aprendizaje, (Sena) pues es técnico en sistemas y su idea inicial fue llevar acceso de internet a sus vecinos, poco apoco le agregó una fotocopiadora, scanner y adicionó computadores para hacer transcripciones. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará partes internas de computadores, hará adecuaciones locativas para mejorara internamente su local.Su meta es vender partes de computadores y lograr la educación superior para todos sus hijos y esto es justamente lo que lo inspira a continuar creciendo.
texts.en:
Luis, 34 years old, is the owner of an internet café, located in the southwest of the city where he lives. He lives with his family and has three children aged from three to nine years old. He has had this business for three years, and he offers photocopying, scanning, and transcription services, as well as the sale of cell phone minutes. He started his business with enthusiasm to put into practice the things he had learned in the National Service of Learning (SENA); he is a systems technician and his initial idea was to provide internet access for his neighbors. Little by little he added a photocopier, scanner, and computers to do transcriptions. 

Now he is requesting a Kiva loan. This is his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and he will use it to buy internal parts for computers and to make locative adjustments to improve the interior of his place of business. His goal is to sell computer parts and to achieve higher education for all his children, which is just what motivates him to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy internal computer parts and to make locative adjustments

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice and cooking seasoning expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cold water and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchases cream, baby oil, hair relaxer and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Justo

texts.en:
Justo is a new farmer and member of Maya Mountain Cacao. He and his wife Serapia live in San Antonio village, Toledo with their six children. Serapia is a housewife and helps at the farm.

Justo started his cacao farm by the assistance from a local association. He was provided with seedlings on which he built his farm. He enjoys pruning his farm and cleaning it because he sees better production. Aside from growing and maintaining his cacao farm, he also plants corn and beans.

Justo currently has about four acres of cacao and now he needs assistance in properly maintaining it. His intentions are to do under-brushing and clearing. After maintaining the farm he plans on extending it with grafted seedlings. In the future, he wants to see his children become educated and in order to do so he must generate money from his farm.

loans.use: To clean his 1000 cacao trees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more cooking oil, rice and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Mark

texts.en:
Mark is a farmer living in a small village in southern Belize. He has four children and has previously farmed crops including beans, corn and rice for his family's subsistence.

Mark is applying for a 1,000 BZD loan through Maya Mountain Cacao as a long term investment in a cacao seedlings nursery holding a thousand trees. He would eventually like to graft these trees to ensure that high-yielding, strong cacao varietals are growing in his community. His aim is to rely on his own work to support himself and his family.

loans.use: to develop a cacao seedlings nursery

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Don Porfirio de 60 años de edad, vive con sus 4 hijos de edades entre 18,14, 12 y una niña de 10 años, los  tres le ayudan a trabajar en la milpa en sus tiempos libres, ya que actualmente una se encuentran estudiando en la universidad y le es difícil ayudarle. 

Don Porfirio se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 15 años, trabajando al lado de su padre que fue quien le enseño a cultivar la tierra, aparte de cultivar la tierra,  don Porfirio  compra y vende ganado ya que cuenta con terrenos extensos y sabe como manejar los negocios con los clientes.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 3 quintales de urea, 2 quintales de sulfato para fertilizar el Maíz en su primera y segunda etapa, con esta técnica podrá darle un buen manejo al cultivo mejorando su producción y así poder tener más ingresos y también poder sacar sus granos básicos para darles una buena alimentación a sus hijos. 

Don Porfirio quiere que sus hijos estudien y se formen bien para que en un futuro no tengan dificultades, además ya puedan tener cada uno sus herencias y pueden poner sus propios negocios.
texts.en:
Porfirio is 60 years old and lives with his four children who are ages 18, 14, 12, and 10 years old. Three of his children help him work in the cornfield during their free time. Since they are currently studying at the university, it is difficult to help him. 

Porfirio has worked in agriculture since he was 15 years old. He worked along side his father who was the one that taught him how to farm the land. Aside from farming, Porfirio buys and sells livestock. He has extensive plots of land and knows how to run the businesses with his clients. 

He is applying for a loan with CrediCampo to buy 300 pounds of urea and 200 pounds of sulfate to fertilize the corn in the first and second phases. With this technique, he can better care for his crops and improve his production. This way he can make more profits and also be able to buy food staples to provide a good diet for his children. 

Porfirio wants his children to study and grow up well so that in the future they do not have difficulties. Also, they can each have their inheritances and can start their own businesses.

loans.use: to buy 300 pounds of urea and 200 pounds of sulfate to fertilize the corn in the first and second phases.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon).

loans.name: Santos Alba

texts.es:
Doña Santos de 47 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora y le gusta mucho el trabajo en el campo. es madre soltera y le acompañan sus 3 hijos de 20, 23 y 25 años de edad. Ellos le ayudan en los quehaceres del hogar y además trabajan la tierra cultivando granos básicos, para tener una buena alimentación.

Ella siempre había trabajado en el campo, ya que le ayuda a sus hijos a cultivar maíz, frijol y Maicillo. Pero, además de ayudar en la agricultura, también aporta con sus ingresos de la venta de platillos típicos como: pasteles, yuca, papas fritas, entre otros.

Con el préstamo el cliente podrá comprar los insumos necesarios para cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, frijol y maicillo, utilizando 8 sacos de fertilizante, 2 canecas de herbicidas, 4 lts de insecticidas y 40 lbs de Maíz.

Doña Santos quiere darle a sus hijos un buena educación, para que en un futuro se puedan valer por si mismos.
texts.en:
Santos, 47, is a very hardworking woman who really enjoys working in the fields.  She's a single mother who lives with her three children, who are 20-, 23-, and 25-years old.  They help her with household chores and they work the land cultivating basic grains so they can have a good yield.

Santos has always worked in the field; she helps her children cultivate corn, beans, and sorghum and also contributes to family income by selling traditional dishes like pastries, french fries, etc.  

With this loan Santos will be able to buy the supplies she needs to cultivate 14,000 square meters of corn, beans, and sorghum, including 8 sacks of fertilizer, 2 bottles of herbicide, 4 liters of insecticide, and 40 lb of corn.

Santos wants to give her children a good education so they can be self-sufficient in the future.

loans.use: to buy 8 sacks of fertilizer, 2 bottles of herbicide, 4 liters of insecticide, and 40 lb of corn, beans so she can cultivate 14,000 square meters of corn, beans, and sorghum.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
Esmeralda is a small entrepreneur and Kubo Financiero’s client. This is her story:

Esmeralda is 28 years old, lives in common law with her partner and together they have two children. The four of them live in her mother’s house. She has been working in commerce for seven years now. First she helped her mom in her pet clothing and costumes fabrication business and now he has her own tailor shop, specializing in school uniforms and also selling footwear and lingerie.

During the day Esmeralda attends to her clients and visits the ones who are interested in buying some of her catalog merchandise. At night she runs a hot wings and french fry stand in her neighborhood. She asks for this loan to invest in merchandise for her business, specially cloth, thread, footwear and lingerie.

She expects the effort she puts into her work to transform into vacations, fun and economic stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise needed in her business, specially cloth, thread, footwear and lingerie

loans.name: Mujeres De Chipuac Group

texts.en:
The Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Mujeres de Chipuac” is located in a rural area of Totonicapán the Western Highlands of Guatemala. It is made up of eight hard-working and enthusiastic ladies who are involved in textile production. Totonicapán is well-known as an area that produces beautiful “tube type” skirts called “cortes”, many of which are woven with “ikat” type designs in various colors. These skirts are sold in marketplaces throughout Guatemala and are in great demand.

Tomasa is the 48-year-old Treasurer of the Trust Bank. In spite of the fact that she does not know how to read or write, she has been able to teach herself many things and does her job well. As is the case with the other ladies in the Trust Bank, Tomasa makes “cortes” and is requesting a loan to purchase a variety of thread which she will use to create new designs and increase her clientele. Her dream is to make enough income so that her last daughter, who is 13 years old, can attend school.

Together with the other ladies in the Trust Bank, Tomasa is happy to participate in the monthly meetings with a Friendship Bridge Loan Officer. There is an educational component to these meetings and the women learn about relevant subjects like healthy foods, women’s rights, and the prevention of violence, as well as self-esteem. Other topics include accounting and budgeting, customer service and indebtedness.

Each of the ladies in the “Mujeres de Chipuac” Trust Bank are poised to enjoy a more prosperous and happier future because of the loans and educational trainings. They are most grateful to KIVA investors for their kindness and generosity. Thank you KIVA investors!

loans.use: to purchase a variety of thread.

loans.name: Dúo Adonai Group

texts.es:
ADONAI 
Doña Hilda Carolina ya lleva más de dos años en su negocio de elaboración de blusas para damas, y a Dios gracias su negocio ha sido bastante favorecido, doña Hilda compra tela conos de hilo, encaje de flores, además doña Hilda trabaja como auxiliar de enfermería y en los días que no tiene turno logra adelantar bastante el trabajo en las blusas, también logra preparar pasteles para cualquier evento, gracias a sus ingresos  en su negocio como también de su trabajo ha logrado la compra de un terreno para lograr construir en un futuro su vivienda y así  brindarle a su pequeña hija un ambiente mejor,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas e Hilos para la elaboracion y venta de blusas.
texts.en: Hilda Carolina has been in business making women's blouses for more than two years and thank God her business has been fortunate.  She buys fabric, spools of thread, and lace flowers.  She also works as a nursing assistant and on days she doesn't have a shift she manages to get a good amount of work done on the blouses and make pastries for any type of event.  Thanks to income from her business and her job, she has managed to buy a plot of land so in the future she can build a house and provide her small daughter with a better environment.  Hilda Carolina is seeking this loan to buy fabric and thread for making and selling blouses.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread to make and sell blouses.

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Raul Leonel

texts.es: Raul tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia y junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeña hija de un año de edad. Raul es un hombre trabajador, emprendedor y visionario. Él se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios de mecánica y mediante la venta de ropa y venta de pollos, dicho negocio lo tiene desde hace 4 años y junto a su compañera de vida lo administran y se gana la vida honradamente. Raul desea incrementar su inventario de venta de ropa y pollos para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de ropa para dama como vestidos, faldas, pantalones, blusas,etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida dado que espera mejorar sus ingresos a partir de esta inversión.
texts.en:
Raul is 21 years old and lives in his own house with his partner and their little one-year-old daughter. Raul is a hard-working man who is entrepreneurial and visionary. He earns a living by working as a mechanic and by selling clothing and chickens. He has had this business for 4 years and he and his partner run it together and make an honest living. 

Raul wants to increase his stock in his clothing and chicken sales business and so he is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy a variety of clothing such as dresses, trousers, blouses etc. He hopes he will be able to get the loan so he can provide better living conditions for his family, since he hopes to improve his income as a result of the loan.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing such as dresses, skirts, trousers, blouses etc.

loans.name: Kenny Efrain

texts.es: Kenny vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, él se dedica a la elaboracion de textiles como por ejemplo chompas, chalinas, mantas, chulos y otros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como lana, hilos y telas. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Kenny lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the south of Peru and belongs to the "Qory Chaska" communal bank of the Arariwa microfinance organisation. He makes a living producing textiles such as jumpers, scarves, blankets, hats and other items. He has been in this business for several years and it is going well for him.

On this occasion he needs the loan to buy work materials such as wool, thread and fabric.

He is grateful for the loan provided and promises to meet his agreed payments.

loans.use: to buy work materials such as wool, thread and fabric.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: Marco Antonio vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, él se dedica a a brindar servicio de seguridad pero en sus horas libres se dedica a estudiar la carrera profesional de contabilidad. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar sus matriculas. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas
texts.en: Marco Antonio lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in the south of Peru and belongs to Asociación Arariwa's "Qory Chaska" communal bank.  He makes his living providing security services but in his free time he is studying for an accounting degree.  He needs a loan at this time to pay for his studies.  He is grateful for the loan and promises to make all the required payments.

loans.use: to pay for his studies.

loans.name: Dúo Flor De Trigo Group

texts.es: Dúo Flor de Trigo, este grupo está conformado por la señora hercilia de 52 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, desde hace varios años se ha dedicado a esta actividad, en esta oportunidad ella está solicitando este crédito para la compra de más mercadería para su negocio esperando que le puedan ayudar ya que en los crédito anteriores no ha caído en mora.
texts.en: Herecilla, 52 years old, is in the Dúo Flor de Trigo group. She sells edible products, and has done this work for several years. She is now requesting a loan to buy more merchandise for her business. She hopes that she can receive help, as with her prior loans she has not defaulted.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 50 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, shampoo, soap, noodles, canned goods, etc.

She has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from farming rice. Tessie aspires to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, shampoo, soap, noodles, canned goods, etc

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a used clothing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to purchase additional used clothes to sell. Elisa has been in this business for ten years. Elisa earns more income from rice-farming and a restaurant.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested additional loan to further build her business.

Elisa has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional used clothes to sell

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Maricel works hard to support her family.

She has a charcoal-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Maricel is borrowing PHP 26,000 through NWTF to buy sacks of charcoal for her business for her charcoal-vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested additional loan to further build her business.

Maricel has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal for her business

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Lourdes works hard to support her family. She has a tailoring business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling tomatoes.  

Lourdes is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy cloth and other tailoring materials for her tailoring business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested additional loan to further build her business.

Lourdes has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy cloth and other tailoring materials for her business

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en: As a married parent of one child, Lorna works hard to support her family. She has a general store in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Lorna is borrowing PHP23,000 through NWTF to purchase canned goods, noodles, eggs, soaps, shampoos, etc. for her general store. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she is requesting an additional loan to further her business. Lorna has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, noodles, eggs, soaps, shampoos, etc.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou has run a small general store for the past six years. She also earns an income from selling food.

Marilou has previously taken out and successfully repaid twenty loans through NWTF. She is now applying for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy additional stock for her store such as chips, bread, canned goods, eggs, sugar, milk, etc.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own effort and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for her store

loans.name: Jenny

texts.en: As a married parent of two children, Jenny works hard to support her family. She has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Jenny is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy vegetables to sell in her food stall. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further her business. Jenny has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Rosel

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Rosel works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig-fattening. 

Rosel is borrowing PHP 14,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy fishing materials for her fishing business, like fishing nets, bamboo, and gasoline. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested this additional loan to further build her business.

Rosel has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials, like fishing nets, bamboo, and gasoline.

loans.name: Nelly Fernanda

texts.es:
Nelly es una mujer dinámica que siempre busca las oportunidades que la vida le ofrece para progresar.
Ella vivió en Cali-Colombia casi toda su vida, pero tuvo que irse a vivir a Medellín-Colombia a causa de las pocas oportunidades que esta ciudad le ofrecía.

Cuando llego a la capital antioqueña se dedicó a buscar su independencia y decidió iniciar con su propio negocio, fue así como empezó con un café Internet.
Hasta el momento ha tenido mucha acogida su establecimiento ya que en el sector donde está ubicado no existen más negocios de este tipo y esto ha sido clave para su progreso.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar una cámara de seguridad y una alarma, esto le permitirá tener más control sobre su negocio ya que la zona donde se encuentra el establecimiento e insegura y ella prefiere no arriesgarse.
Su objetivo es que su negocio sea reconocido y acreditado, ofrecer otros servicios y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes que en su mayoría son estudiantes.
Una de sus dificultades es la temporada de vacaciones escolares ya que disminuye el flujo de venta de sus servicios.
texts.en:
Nelly is a dynamic woman who is always looking for the opportunities for progress that life offers.

She lived in Cali, Colombia, almost all her life, but she had to leave to live in Medellín, Colombia, because of the limited opportunities that her city offered her.

When she arrived at the capital of the department of Antioquia, she dedicated herself to seeking her independence and decided to start her own business. That's how she got started with an internet café.

Up to now, her establishment has been well-received because in the area where it is located, there are no other business of its type; this has been the key to her progress.

She is requesting a loan to buy a security camera and an alarm. This will allow her to have more control over her business, since the neighborhood where the establishment is located is unsafe and she prefers not to put herself at risk.

Her objective is for her business to be well-known and reputable, to offer other services, and satisfy the needs of her customers, who are mostly students.

One of her challenges is the school vacation season, because sales of her services diminish.

loans.use: to purchase a security camera and an alarm for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy 5 more electricity kiosks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic seed fertilizer, thanks to which he will obtain better harvests and better quality seeds and produce more

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil in bulk (by the gallon).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to dispose of dead cacao trees and replant more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Compra de abono orgánico y gallinas pequeñas.

loans.name: Anahi

texts.es: Anahi es divorciada, tiene un hijo y vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento. Anahi trabaja como cajera en una farmacia Necesita un prestamo para pagar un implante dental Anahi es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar y no es apoyada por su marido, por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en: Anahi is divorced. She has a child and lives in the city of La Paz in a house made of brick and cement. Anahi works as a cashier in a pharmacy. She needs a loan in order to pay for a dental implant. Anahi’s earnings are the only source of income for her household and she is not supported by her ex-husband, which is why she needs your help.

loans.use: to pay for a dental implant

loans.name: Sonia Georgina

texts.es: Sonia vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco al sur de Perú y pertenece al banco comunal "Qory Chaska" de la UMF Arariwa, ella se dedica a la venta de anticuchos y ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar carne y papas. Agradece por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Sonia lives in the beautiful city of Cusco in southern Peru. She is a member of Qory Chaska communal bank, which is itself part of Asociación Arariwa. She sells typical food to go and has been doing so for several years. She says the business is doing well and asks for a loan in order to buy meat and potatoes. She thanks lenders for their help and promises to be punctual in her repayments.

loans.use: to buy meat and potatoes.

loans.name: Gloria Esmeralda

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Mujeres Por EL Progreso.
En este lugar vive la señora Gloria, tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, tres de ellos mayores de edad y la menor de 16 años que    estudia en colegio y es la única que vive con ellos. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Gloria con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo y zapatos por catalogo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de alguna prenda, ella deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días, este negocio empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco comunal hace más de 10 años el cual le ha ayudado a salir adelante junto a su familia.
Con este crédito ella va a comprar ropa de todo tipo y zapatos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 10 años y le gusta porque así empezó su negocio el cual le permite salir adelante. Sus sueños son que su hija sea profesional algún día.
texts.en:
The members of Mujeres por el Progreso Communal Bank meet every two weeks in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a town known for its great variety of traditional products, such as the straw hats made from toquilla palm leaves that are famous throughout the country and abroad.

Gloria, 57, lives in this town. She's married and has four children, three of whom are adults. The youngest one, 16, goes to school and is the only one who lives with them. Gloria's husband is a driver.

Gloria sells clothing and shoes via catalogue so she can earn a little money on her own and help her husband with the household expenses.  She sells door-to-door as well as at home, where her customers go when they need clothes. She leaves her products on credit and collects payment every two weeks. She started this business more than ten years ago with her first loan from the communal bank. It has helped her get ahead with her family.

With this loan Gloria's going to buy a variety of clothes and shoes.  She has been in her communal bank for 10 years and she likes it because that's how she started her business, which allows her to get ahead.  Her dream is for her daughter to be a professional some day.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes

loans.name: Edwin Ruben

texts.es: El joven Edwin tiene 27 años y es casado,  estudia la carrera  de licenciatura en informática en una de las universidades reconocidas  de  la Ciudad de La Paz,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios El joven Edwin tiene un café internet es de ahí que tiene un ingreso extra,  este es su primer crédito con la institución y  el joven Edwin va a usar este préstamo para  la compra de material de escritorio y libros  ya que esto le ayudara a realizar sus trabajos,  Edwin enfrenta retos en su estudios que son Su trabajo no le permite dedicarse completamente a sus  estudio, pero el joven tiene ganas de continuar y seguir adelante, su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere ejercer su profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia y con el tiempo poder tener una especialidad en su área como también mejorar su café internet.
texts.en: The young man Edwin is 27 years old and is married. He is studying for a career in computer science in one of the well known universities of the city of La Paz. He works to pay for his studies. The young José has an internet cafe. It is from this that he has an extra income. This is his first loan with the institution, and the young Edwin is going to use this loan to purchase stationery supplies and books, since this will help him to do his work. Edwin faces challenges in his studies, which are that his work doesn't allow him to completely dedicate himself to his studies, but the young man has the will to continue and move forward. His wish when he finishes his studies is to practice his profession, improve his quality of life and that of his family, and with time be able to have a specialty in his area, as well as improving his internet cafe,

loans.use: to buy stationery supplies and books

loans.name: Lizeth

texts.es: Lizeth tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos de 16 años, 14 años, 13 años y 9 años de edad. Lizeth es pequeña comerciante de variedad de verduras las cuales distribuye en las principales zonas de su localidad. Tiene 8 años de contar con este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Con el deseo de hacer crecer su negocio y así aumentar sus ingresos ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de verduras al por mayor como: tomates, cebollas, chiles, papas, repollos, ect. Espera y tiene plena confianza que de esta forma logrará mejorar sus ventas e ingresos que le permitirán dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Lizeth is 39 years old and lives in her own house, together with her life partner and her four children ages 16, 14, 13, and 9. Lizeth is a small seller of a variety of vegetables which she distributes in the main areas of her locality. She has had this business for eight years, so she has many clients, who prefer her more every day. 

With the desire to grow her business and increase her income, she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a variety of vegetables wholesale: tomatoes, onions, chile peppers, potatoes, cabbages, etc. She hopes and has full confidence that in this way she will be able to increase her sales and income, which will allow her to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, chile peppers, potatoes, cabbages, etc.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is the parent of four children and has a motorcycle repair shop in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from her sari sari, or general store.

Marites has taken out and successfully repaid fifteen loans through NWTF and is now applying for a 24,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies for the business. She hopes that her hard work will help her save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional supplies for the business.

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en:
Genalyn is married and has four children. She works hard selling fish in the Philippines. The family also earns money from its motorcycle transport business.

Genalyn previously borrowed and successfully repaid seven loans through NWTF. She is now applying for a 23,000 PHP loan to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Genalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own effort and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Nalinda

texts.en: Nalinda is 43 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as snack foods, sugar, canned goods, noodles and other groceries. Nalinda has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF prior to this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from rice farming. Nalinda aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as snack foods, sugar, canned goods, noodles and other groceries.

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en: As a married parent of three children, Shiela works hard to support her family. She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening and vegetable farming. Shiela is borrowing PHP 11,500 through NWTF to buy ingredients such as sugar, yeast, margarine, milk, etc. for her bakery business. She has successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further her business. Shiela has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sugar, yeast, margarine, milk, etc.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca, a 56-year-old married mother of four children, one of whom is still in school, works very hard to provide for her family.

For 15 years now, Rebecca has operated a general store in the Philippines; she has requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell such as soft drinks, canned goods, eggs, spices, chips, etc.

Rebecca would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell such as soft drinks, canned goods, eggs, spices, chips, etc

loans.name: Remegia

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Remegia works hard to support her family. She has a pig fattening business in the Philippines, and earns additional income by farming rice.  

Remegia, who repaid her previous loan, is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. This will enable her to further build her enterprise.

Remegia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Purita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Purita works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell mud crabs business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from pig-fattening. 

Purita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional mud crabs to sell for her buy-and-sell mud crabs business.

Purita has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional mud crabs to sell.

loans.name: Farley Ester

texts.es:
Farley es una mujer con convicción, metas claras y fuerza de progreso pues a sus 33 años ha sido testigo de cómo su negocio ha ido creciendo y tomando fuerza.
Inicialmente empezó con su actividad de confección a terceros en fabricación de jeans contando solo con tres máquinas, pero ahora, gracias a su constancia cuenta con un taller más grande y poco más de máquinas, además de tener a su cargo a tres personas contratadas.
Ella solicita recursos económicos para adquirir una maquina plana y una sublimadora, elementos que le darán un impulso y le permitirá contar con más trabajo, ya que en estos momentos el volumen de producción no alcanza a cubrir la cantidad de pedidos que tiene.
Al obtener estos elementos podrá ofrecer más empleos y ayudará a más gente a ocuparse.
Su gran sueño es darle todo lo mejor a su hijo de 11 años que es el centro de su vida y el motivo por el cual se esfuerza y lucha día tras día.
texts.en:
Farley is a woman with strong convictions, clear goals and the strength to make progress in life. At the age of 33, she has witnessed how her business has been growing and increasing in strength. 

She originally started her tailoring work making jeans for third parties, with only three machines. However, now, thanks to her perseverance, she has a larger workshop and a few more machines, and she has three people working for her under contract. 

She is requesting economic resources to purchase a sewing machine and a transfer press. This equipment will give her a boost and allow her to take on more work, since currently her production volume is not sufficient to cover the number of orders she has. 

When she obtains this equipment, she will be able to offer more jobs and help more people to be employed. 

Her great dream is to give all the best to her 11-year-old son, who is at the center of her life and who is the reason that she works hard and puts forth effort day after day.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and a transfer press.

loans.name: Miriam Patricia

texts.es:
Miriam es una mujer luchadora y toda su vida ha dedicado sus esfuerzos a sus 9 hijos y su esposo.
Ella tiene un pequeño negocio en el cual prepara y vende comidas rápidas (hamburguesas, perros calientes, papas fritas, entre otros); este oficio lo aprendió desde muy joven al lado de su madre que toda su vida fue comerciante, fue quien le enseño a preparar los alimentos y ofrecerlos a sus clientes.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar elementos desechables como platos, vasos y cubiertos, adicional a esto aprovechara el dinero para comprar bebidas gaseosas, carnes frías y panes; esto le permitirá surtir su oferta de productos y brindarles a sus clientes más variedad de alimentos.
El mayor desafío que enfrenta es la falta de recursos económicos para impulsar su negocio y su mayor sueño es ver su negocio progresar y ser prospero, ya que desea dejarle un legado a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Miriam is a hard-working woman.  She has spent her whole life dedicating her energy to her nine children and her husband. 
Miriam has a small business preparing and selling fast food (hamburgers, hotdogs, french fries and other items).  She learned the trade as a young girl alongside her mother, who was a shopkeeper her whole life and taught Miriam how to prepare food and sell it to their customers. 
Miriam is requesting a loan to purchase disposable goods like plates, cups and cutlery.  In addition, she will take advantage of the loan to purchase soft drinks, cold cuts and bread.  This will allow to her stock up on items to sell and offer her customers a greater variety of food choices. 
The greatest challenge that Miriam faces is a lack of financial resources to drive her business.  Her greatest dream is to see her business progress and prosper; she wants to leave her children a legacy.

loans.use: to stock up her business with disposable utensils and to purchase items that she needs to prepare the food she sells.

loans.name: Astrid Julieth

texts.es:
Astrid es una mujer de amplia experiencia en el área comercial a pesar de su corta edad, ya que ha tenido diferentes empleos en los cuales ha podido adquirir varios conocimientos.
Ella posee un pequeño almacén de venta de ropa en una zona de alto tráfico de potenciales clientes, decidió iniciar su negocio luego de trabajar en una comercializadora de calzado al por mayor y adquirir una vasta experiencia.
Su inspiración son sus dos hijos a los cuales trata de dedicarles el mayor tiempo posible.
Ella solicita el crédito para abastecerse con una amplia variedad de productos como ropa y accesorios, al aumentar su volumen de surtido podrá ofrecer y vender más productos y por ende aumentar sus ingresos.
Su mayor desafío es la falta de capital para surtir su negocio pero confía en esta ayuda para lograrlo pues se le nota mucho entusiasmo y fe en su actividad.
Su mayor sueño es poseer un almacén mas grande y ofrecer sus productos al por mayor a las grandes cadenas, al obtener más ingresos podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y su esposo.
texts.en:
Astrid is a woman with extensive experience in sales, in spite of her young age, since she has had different jobs in which she has been able to acquire varied knowledge. She has a small store selling clothing in an area with high-traffic of potential clients. She decided to start her business after working in a wholesale footwear shop and acquiring vast experience.

Her inspiration is her two children, to whom she tries to dedicate as much time as possible. She is requesting the loan in order to stock up on a wide variety of products, such as clothing and accessories. Once she increases her stock, she can offer and sell more products and thus increase her income.

Her greatest challenge is the lack of capital to stock her business, but she trusts that this help will allow her to achieve it. She is very enthusiastic and has a lot of faith in her business. Her biggest dream is to have a larger store and offer wholesale products to large chains. When she has a greater income, she will be able to improve her children´s and husband´s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing and accessories to stock her store

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: La señora María Teresa trabaja durante un periodo de tiempo de 10 años como vendedora y promotora comercial en varios almacenes y empresas reconocidas, de los cuales adquirió mucha experiencia hasta que llego el día de montar su propio negocio y es así como hace tres años comenzó con una tienda de Medicamentos, alimentos y accesorios para mascotas con la cual ayuda monetariamente en su hogar. María se enfrenta a un gran problema y es el alto costo de algunos medicamentos para mascotas y es por esto que requiere una ayuda crediticia para tratar de tener en su establecimiento los medicamentos que requiera cualquier cliente, pues cada que le dice a un cliente que no tiene el medicamento que requiere se le parte el alma al saber que esa mascota tiene un sufrimiento y solo ese medicamento lo puede calmar, el crédito requerido será exclusivamente para la compra de medicamentos con los que espera suplir esa falencia y poder afianzar su negocio cada vez mas para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda montar sucursales en diferentes sectores de la ciudad
texts.en: Señora María Teresa has worked for ten years as a saleswoman and a product promoter for various well-known department stores and companies.  She acquired a lot of experience from these positions, until the day came to start her own business.  Three years ago she opened a store selling pet medications, food and accessories.  With the income from her business, she is able to help her household financially.  María is facing a big problem, which is the high cost of some pet medications.  She needs the help of a loan to try to have available in her establishment the medications her customers need.  Every time María tells a customer that she doesn't have the medication they need, it breaks her heart to know that a pet is suffering and only that specific mediation could help.  The loan she needs will be used exclusively to purchase medications, with which she hopes to fill the void and be able to secure her business even more.  In the not too distant future she wants to open branches of her store in different areas of the city.

loans.use: to buy pet medicine for resale

loans.name: Ana Lucía

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer con grandes aspiraciones en su vida, una de ellas es ser totalmente independiente y tener un gran almacén en el cual ofrecer sus productos.
Desde hace 4 años inicio con su almacén en el cual vende productos para el cuidado de la piel, perfumes, cremas de manos, maquillaje, entre otros. Este local lo tiene ubicado al interior de un hotel, en el cual ella se desempeña como administradora.
Su gran ventaja es que al hotel llegan muchas personas y esto permite que ella pueda ofrecer sus productos más fácilmente.
Ana sabe el significado del trabajo duro ya que labora simultáneamente en los dos medios y esto hace que tenga que hacer un esfuerzo extra para obtener más ingresos. Lastimosamente esto le ha quitado tiempo valioso con su hijo de 5 años, tiempo que ella desea recuperar.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar una vitrina nueva ya que la que tenía se le rompió y ha tenido que llevarse gran cantidad de mercancía para su casa.
Su mayor anhelo es independizarse económicamente y dedicarse en pleno a su negocio y así poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida y educación a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Ana is a woman with great aspirations in life. One of them is to be totally independent and have a great store where she can offer her products. She started her store 4 years ago and sells skin care products, hand cream, makeup, and more. Her locale is inside of a hotel where she acts as manager. 

Her big advantage is that a lot of people go to the hotel and this allows her to offer her products more easily. Ana knows the meaning of hard work since she works in two different things at the same time. To do this she has to make an extra effort to obtain more income. Unfortunately, this takes valuable time away from her 5 year old son, time that she wants to recover. 

She is asking for a loan to buy a new display case because the one she had was broken and she had to take a lot of merchandise home. Her biggest wish is to become financially independent with her business and offer a better quality of life and education to her young son.

loans.use: to buy a new display case to replace one that was broken so that she can display her products.

loans.name: María Rosina

texts.es:
María, una mujer de 58 años tuvo que llevar las obligaciones del hogar en el momento en que se separo de su esposo, por esta razón se ha desempeñado como madre soltera, tiene un único hijo al cual le ha dedicado los mejores años de su vida.
Tiene un pequeño negocio en el que vende productos como frituras, gaseosas, dulces y prepara alimentos como empanadas y papas rellenas. Su chaza está ubicada cerca a un colegio y por esta razón sus clientes son estudiantes y docentes en su mayoría.
En esto momentos solicita un apoyo económico para surtir su negocio de productos comestibles, principalmente gaseosas, también ingredientes para sus preparaciones.
Al comprar estos elementos al por mayor los puede adquirir a precios mucho más económicos y esto hará que sus utilidades aumenten.
Ella tiene deseos de progreso, por eso trata de hacer lo posible para que su negocio sea prospero y duradero.
texts.en:
María, 58, had to take care of household obligations when she separated from her husband. For this reason, she has carried on as a single mother. She has a son, to whom she has dedicated the best years of her life.

She has a small business selling products such as fried foods, drinks, sweets, and preparing food such as empanadas and stuffed potatoes. Her stand is near a school, so her customers are mostly students and teachers.

She is currently requesting economic support to stock her business with groceries, mainly soft drinks, and also ingredients to prepare food. By buying these items wholesale, she will be able to get much better prices and her profits will increase.

She has the desire to progress, so she does everything possible for her business to be prosperous and strong.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products such as soft drinks, sweets, and fried foods.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de grandes ambiciones y objetivos, a sus 57 años tiene muy claro hasta donde desea llegar con sus sueños.
El tiene un negocio de comercialización de artesanías como billeteras en cuero y artículos fabricados en lana. Adicional a esto sabe fabricar artesanías gracias a su experiencia de 45 años en este mercado.
El solicita un préstamo para adquirir mar referencias de productos y así cumplir con la demanda de artículos artesanales que tiene.
Uno de sus objetivos es viajar a los municipios de Antioquia y ofrecer sus productos en las ferias, ya que es un evento con gran afluencia de posibles clientes.
El desea tener un local en el cual tener sus objetos y artículos exhibidos ya que por ahora este oficio lo realiza ambulantemente durante largas jornadas.
Una de sus mayores dificultades es la época de lluvia en la cual sus ventas disminuyen considerablemente.
texts.en:
Jorge is a man of great ambitions and goals. At the age of 57, he has very clear ideas where he wants his dreams to take him.

He has a business of selling handicrafts such as leather wallets and articles made from wool. In addition to this, he knows how to make handicrafts, thanks to his 45 years of experience in this market.

He is applying for a loan to acquire more of these products and thus meet the demand that he has for artisanal articles.

One of his objectives is to travel to the towns of Antioquia and offer his products at the fairs, since it is an event with a great influx of potential customers.

He wants to have a shop in which to have his objects and articles exhibited, since for now he works as a itinerant vendor making long trips. On of his greatest difficulties is the rainy season, when his sales go down considerably.

loans.use: to buy articles in leather and wool to increase his offerings of products

loans.name: Juan David

texts.es:
Juan es hombre emprendedor con grandes aspiraciones, tiene un hijo de 5 años por el cual ha luchado incansablemente y ha procurado que nada le falte.
El inicio con su negocio en comercialización de aromáticas gracias a su suegra, ya que ella tenía contacto con uno de los proveedores más grandes de aromáticas en el municipio de Itagüí – Colombia; y le ayudo a crear un enlace comercial entre ellos.
Al principio él trabajaba como distribuidor del producto pero al ver que el negocio era bastante rentable decidió independizarse y comenzar a comprar el producto al por mayor para luego venderlo por su propia cuenta.
El solicita un apoyo económico para comprar una gran cantidad de aromáticas y así tener un stock bastante amplio y aumentar sus utilidades.
Uno de sus grandes anhelos comerciales es tener una bodega en la cual tener su  mercancía, así podrá ofrecer una más amplia variedad de productos a sus clientes, que en su mayoría son comerciantes mayoritarios.
texts.en:
Juan is an enterprising man with great aspirations. He has a 5 year old son for whom he has worked tirelessly and made sure lacks for nothing. 

He started his business of selling teas thanks to his mother-in-law because she d a contact with one of the biggest suppliers of teas in the city of Itagüí, Colombia, and she helped him establish a business connection with them. 

At first he worked as a product distributor, but when he saw that the business was very profitable he decided to start working independently and buy the product at wholesale price and then sell it himself. 

He is requesting a loan to buy a large quantity of teas so he can have a lot of stock and increase his profits.

One of his biggest wishes is to have a warehouse to store his merchandise. That way he could offer a greater variety of products to his clients, most of whom are wholesale sellers.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of products such as teas and disposable items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a food trolley with which she will be able to offer a wider selection of products.
