loans.name: Mayra Elizabeth

texts.es: Mayra es una señora casada que vive con su esposo y su hijo de 2 años, ella se dedica desde hace 8 años a la crianza de chanchos y tambien se dedica a la ganaderia, el credito lo va a invertir an la compra de chanchos para ampliar su negocio, su aspiracion es que  mediante el crecimiento de este negocio incremente sus ingresos para comprar una casa y poder vivir mas tranquila con su familia.
texts.en: Mayra is married and lives with her husband and their child, who is two years old. She has been raising pigs for eight years, as well as other livestock. She will use the loan to buy more pigs in order to expand her business. Her ambition is to improve her income through growth, in order to buy a house and be able to live with her family without worrying too much about what the future could bring.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz fue una ama de casa dedicada a su hogar y a sus hijos, siempre le gusto el arte de la cocina y realizó varios cursos y talleres por hobby.
Cuando su esposo se pensiono, decidió iniciar con su propio negocio con el afán de ocuparse y obtener algunos ingresos.
Hoy en día es la dueña de un  negocio de comidas rápidas desde hace 8 meses, adquirió el local gracias a que un amigo lo estaba vendiendo y vio allí su gran oportunidad.
Ella trabaja junto a su esposo que ha sido su mano derecha en todo, y el negocio ha hecho que ellos se unan mas como pareja.
Además genera 2 empleos los cuales han sido fundamentales para el éxito del negocio.
Su anhelo es poder dejarle un legado a sus hijos y tener ingresos más estables.
Ella trabaja en un horario de 3:00 pm a 10:00 pm y en la mañana se dedica al oficio que mas la enorgullece, y es el rol de ser mamá.
En estos momentos Luz necesita recursos para comprar un horno industrial, acondicionar un extractor de olores y realizar algunas mejoras locativas, esto les permitirá atraer más clientes al negocio y mejorar sus ventas.
Ella sueña con tener un negocio más grande y acreditado, por eso lucha incansablemente para lograrlo.
texts.en:
Luz was a housewife dedicated to her home and to her children, who has always loved the art of cooking and she attended a variety of classes and workshops as a hobby. 

When her husband retired, Luz decided to set her own business with the desire to keep herself busy and obtain a source of income. For the last eight months she has been the owner of a fast-food business, she obtained the premises thanks to the fact that a friend was selling it and she saw a great opportunity there. She works together with her husband who has been her right-hand man in everything, and the business has made them stronger as a couple. In addition, she generated two jobs which have been fundamental to the success of the business. Her dream is to leave her children a legacy and have a more stable income.

Luz works from 3:00 pm to 10:00 pm and in the morning she dedicates her time to what makes her most proud, her role as a mother. In these times, Luz needs money to buy an industrial oven, to install an extractor fan and make some improvements to the premises, this will allow her to attract more customers to the business and improve their sales. She dreams of having a large business with good credit, hence why she is tirelessly fighting to achieve this.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven, to install an extractor fan and to improve the premises.

loans.name: Nohora Vilma

texts.es:
Nohora es una mujer que tiene muy clara la clave para que los clientes de cualquier negocio se sientan satisfechos y bien atendidos, el buen trato y buen servicio.
La señora tiene un negocio de venta de productos por catálogo de marcas reconocidas, se desempeña en este oficio desde hace 6 años y ha obtenido muy buen reconocimiento por parte de sus clientes que en su mayoría son las personas del barrio donde vive y sus alrededores.
Con su carisma y buen humor a creado fidelidad entre sus clientes y esto le ha permitido mantenerse en el negocio.
Ella tiene dos hijos y su mayor sueño es apoyarlos para que cumplan sus metas y sean profesionales.
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar un mayor surtido de productos, entre ellos cabe destacar cremas de manos, perfumes, ropa interior y artículos para el hogar. Con este surtido puede crear un stock de productos más amplio, sin olvidar lo económico que sería comprarlos al por mayor. Esto le permitirá obtener más y mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Nohora is a woman who very clearly understands the key to any business is that customers feel satisfied and well looked after, receive good treatment and good service.  She has a business selling products from catalogs of well-known brands.

She has been in this business for six years and has earned a very good reputation from her customers who are mostly people from her neighborhood and nearby.  With her charisma and good humor, she has created loyalty among her customers and this has allowed her to stay in business.

She has two children and her biggest dream is to support them so that they achieve their goals and have professional careers. She is requesting a loan to buy a wider range of products, including include hand creams, perfumes, underwear and household items. With this assortment she can create a larger stock of products, not to mention how more economical it would be to buy them in bulk. This will give her more and better income.

loans.use: to buy a wider range of personal products to sell.

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es: Ana tiene  50 años,  ella vive en una ciudad pequeña  donde no existen mucha competencia en tiendas de productos comestible y confites que es lo que ofrece en su negocio,  esto hace que le vaya bien en las ventas, esta  señora responsable  tiene su tienda desde hace 20 años, vive con su esposo y tiene 2 hijos los que ya son independientes ya que sus padres les supieron educar y les enseñaron a trabajar, comenta que su esposo se dedica al jornal, con el credito va a comprar mercaderia en productos para su tienda, ella aspira seguir trabajando en su negocio e incrementarlo para oferecer mas variedad a sus clientes y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos para tener una vejez digna.
texts.en:
Ana is 50 years old and lives in a small city where there isn't much competition from grocery and clothing stores, which is what she offers in her business. This means that her sales are doing well.

This responsible woman has had her store for some 20 years. She lives with her husband and they have 2 children who are now independent, since their parents knew how to educate them, teaching them to work. Ana notes that her husband dedicates himself to day labor.

With this loan, Ana will purchase merchandise products for her store. She desires to continue working in her business, hoping to expand it in order to offer more variety to her customers and, in this manner, to improve her income so that she can enjoy an old age with dignity.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de gran conocimiento en el área de confección. A sus 35 años se siente capacitada para realizar cualquier trabajo de costura y modistería, en pocas palabras es una mujer de grandes esfuerzos.
Vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, a los cuales ha sabido sostener con firmeza y dándoles mucho amor.
Ella inicio con su negocio de confección hace tres años, y en este realiza contratos a terceros; además trabaja como independiente en su casa haciendo trabajos de modistería y reformas a sus familiares, amigos y vecinos.
Su deseo es tener un taller de confecciones más grande y así podrá generar empleo, y tener mejor estabilidad económica, porque en estos momentos sus ingresos son muy inestables y teniendo en cuenta el tamaño de su familia es difícil sostenerse.
Por eso solicita un préstamo para comprar una maquina de confección y poder darle empleo a otra persona, también podrá incrementar sus ingresos y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
La dificultad más grande que tiene son las temporadas en las cuales las confecciones pierden mucho poder en el mercado como por ejemplo en los meses de Marzo y Abril.
texts.en:
Rosa is a woman with a lot of knowledge in the field of sewing. At 35 years of age, she feels able to perform any type of needlework or dressmaking, in short, she is a very hard working woman. She lives with her husband and their four children, who she has brought up with a firm hand and with a lot of love. 

Rosa started her sewing business three years ago and has fulfilled contracts for third parties as well as working as a freelancer in her home doing needlework and alterations for relatives, friends and neighbors.

Her dream is to have a larger sewing workshop and their generate jobs and have a greater level of financial stability because in these times, her income is very unstable and given the size of her family, it's difficult to uphold the family. This is why Rosa is seeking a loan to buy a sewing machine in order to give a job to another person, she will also be able to increase her sales and give her children a better quality of life. Her greatest difficulty is the seasons in which good lose a lot of sway in the market as is the case of March and April for example.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Gloria Susana

texts.es: Susana  se dedica a la ganaderia y tambien vende productos de visuteria por medio de revista para poder cubrir sus gastos  y los de su madre, ella vive con su madre y con un sobrino, se dedica hace 4 años al cuidado de ganado, dice que  su madre es quien le enseño a esta actividad, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para seguir adelante con su negocio, Susana es una chica muy trabajadora y  comenta que la crianza de vacas es muy productiva y que aspira ampliar su negocio.
texts.en: Susana raises livestock and also sells jewellery through a catalogue in order to pay for household expenses (hers and her mother's). She lives with her mother and her nephew and has been in animal husbandry for four years. Her mother taught her the ropes. She will use the loan to buy a cow in order to keep the business going. Susana is a very hard-working young lady and says that raising cows is a very profitable activity. She hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Claribel

texts.es:
Ella se llama Claribel, la motiva estudiar atención integral  a la primera infancia,  por aprender del desarrollo de un niño o niña durante la primera infancia, los estímulos que les brindan  y de las condiciones en que se desenvuelven ellos, es por esto que quiere aprender, porque en la etapa más  comprendida  es entre los cero y los cinco años de edad, es necesario atender a los niños y las niñas de manera armónica, teniendo en cuentan los componentes de salud, nutrición, protección y educación inicial en diversos contextos (familiar, comunitario, institucional) de tal manera que se les brinde apoyo para la supervivencia, crecimiento, desarrollo y aprendizaje. 
Se considera una persona paciente para los niños, cariñosa respetuosa, entendida, amable, con todos los valores éticos que una maestra puede tener, es una persona con mucha actitud para jugar con ellos y compartir ratos agradables. 
Escogió esta institución para estudiar por muy buenas referencias de amigos y familiares, porque se acomoda el horario y la cercanía. 
Necesita el subsidio de kiva porque es una ayuda económica que necesita, ya que sola se esta pagando el estudio y le gustaría que le ayudaran con ese descuento, a veces  no me alcanza para los utilices. 
Los planes a futuro con esta carrera  es ser docente de preescolar, es la gran meta y desempeñarse en lo que ha aprendido en la institución de campo alto.
texts.en:
Her name is Claribel Walteros, her motive is to study comprehensive care for early childhood, in order to learn about children’s development during early childhood, the stimuli offered to them and the conditions under which they develop. This why she wants to learn, because in the stage spanned - between zero and five years of age - it is necessary to care for children in harmony, keeping in mind the components of health, nutrition, protection and early education in various contexts (family, community, institution) so that they are supported for survival, growth, development and learning.

She considers herself to be patient with children, affectionate, respectful, understanding and friendly, with all the ethical values that a teacher can have. She is a person disposed towards playing with children and sharing pleasant moments.

She chose to study at this institution due to good references from friends and family, and because the timetable and closeness of the location suit her.

She needs the Kiva grant because she needs financial assistance, since she alone is paying for these studies and she would like them to help her with this loan. Sometimes she cannot afford school supplies.

Her future plan for these professional studies is to be a preschool teacher - this is the great goal - and put into practice what she has learned in the CampoAlto institute.

loans.use: to pay for one semester of tuition.

loans.name: Lilian Carolina

texts.es: Lilian tiene 37 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijas de 14 años y 12 años de edad. Lilian se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como: yuca frita, pasteles de carne, refrescos naturales, gaseosas, etc. De esta forma lleva el sustento a su familia y mantiene la economía del hogar. Dado que su negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y  es el que le permite dar a sus hijas lo necesario ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de una cocina nueva dado que la tiene se arruino y su principal herramienta de trabajo. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder mantener su negocio por mucho más tiempo.
texts.en: Lilian is 37 and lives in a house of her own together with her two daughters, aged 14 and 12. She sells typical food to go, such as fried yuca and meat pies, as well as natural refreshments and fizzy drinks. This is how she supports her family and pays for household expenses. Considering her business is her main source of income, and that it is what enables her to pay for her daughters' basic necessities, Liliana decided to ask FUSAI for a loan in order to improve her business through investment. She will buy a new cooker to replace her main working tool, which has broken down. She hopes to get the loan in order to keep the business going for a long time.

loans.use: to buy a new cooker, vegetables, and cereals.

loans.name: Dúo Reyna Group

texts.es:
DÚO REYNA
Este dúo formado por doña Marta Julia, quien nos cuenta que es casada, tiene 46 años y se dedica a la crianza de gallinas de país y pavos, en su casa y también vende ropa típica desde hace 16 años, y solicita este crédito porque necesita comprar gallinas porque por la época de semana santa, muchas personas consumen carne de gallina, y las que tiene no son suficientes, también quiere comprar algunas blusas que le han pedido porque  por el calor están vendibles, ella con su trabajo ayuda a su esposo con sus hijos que están estudiando ya en carrera y gastan demasiado.
texts.en: Marta Julia is a member of the duo Dúo Reyna. She is 46 and married, and raises chickens and turkeys at home. She has been doing this as well as selling typical clothing for 16 years. She asks for a loan because she needs to buy chickens, since, during Holy Week, many people eat chicken, and she doesn't have enough to meet such demand. She also wishes to buy a few blouses, which are in demand because of the heat. With her business, Marta Julia helps her husband support their children through university, because they have high expenses.

loans.use: to buy chickens as well as blouses to sell.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора замужем, ей 27 лет. Она живет в районе Шахринав, в большой семье мужа. Уже три года как Гулнора занимается выращиванием крупнороготого скота для продажи. Она успевает вести и домашнее хозяйство и ухаживать за скотами. Гулнора по природе трудолюбивая женщина. Она никогда не отказывается от выполнения работы. Сейчас в ее хозяйстве имеется всего одна корова. Она хочет увеличить поголовье скота и берет кредит для реализации закупки. Ваша поддержка очень нужна ей.
texts.en: Gulnora is 27 years old and married.  She lives with her husband's large family in the Shahrinav district.  Gulnora has been involved in raising cattle for sale for three years.  She is able to run the household and take care of livestock.  By nature, Gulnora is a hardworking woman.  She never refuses doing the work.  Now her household only has one cow.  She wants to increase the livestock headcount and is requesting this loan to make the purchase.  Your support is very needed.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Рахима 52-летняя жительница города Турсунзаде. У нее среднее образование. Она в течение 10 лет работает в сельском хозяйстве. Рахима занимается выращиванием огородных культур. Ей в деятельности помогают муж и дети. Они работают на приусадебном участке земли и уже посадили будущий урожай. Сейчас самое время для обработки посевов. Поэтому Рахима обратилась за кредитом для того чтобы приобрести минеральные удобрения. Она хочет получить получить хороший и качественный урожай.
texts.en: Rahima is a 52-year-old resident of the city of Tursun-zoda.  She has a secondary education.  She has been working in agriculture for 10 years.  Rahima is involved in growing garden crops.  Her husband and children help her with the business.  They work on their plot of land and already planted the future harvest.  Now is the ideal time to treat the planted crops.  This is why Rahima requested this loan in order to buy mineral fertilizers.  She wants to get a good and quality harvest.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers for treating planted crops

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is 54 years old and married with eight children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Emelia has a business making and selling dried fish in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. 

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients to souse (soak in salt water solution) her dried fish.

In the future, Emelia would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to souse her dried fish.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional feeds for her pigs for her pig fattening business.

Betty has been in this business for 6 years. Betty earns more income from handicraft and farming rice.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Betty has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional feeds for her pigs

loans.name: Leslie Ann

texts.en:
Leslie Ann is 28 years old and married, with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 24,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more stocks to sell, like canned goods, eggs, soap, noodles, and spices.

Leslie Ann has borrowed and paid ten loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from buy-and-sell fish. Leslie Ann aspires to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell, like canned goods, eggs, soap, noodles, and spices.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Nelly works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice.  Nelly is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Nelly has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en:
Ma. Fe is a 37-year-old married woman with four children; two of her children are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Ma. Fe has a bakery business in the Philippines. Ma. Fe requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like flour, and sugar for her business.

Ma. Fe has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, Ma. Fe would like to save money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her bakery business

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell spices business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more items to sell for her buy and sell spices business.

Rosalinda has been in this business for 6 years. Rosalinda earns more income from food vending.

Rosalinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
As a married parent of thirteen children, Juanita works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Juanita is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her food vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested additional loan to further build her business.

Juanita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Milyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Milyn works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buy-and-sell fish. 

Milyn is borrowing PHP 14,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy fishing materials for her fishing business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Milyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for her fishing business.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 46 years old and married with seven children, four of whom are in school.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Marlyn is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase additional seeds and farm supplies.

Marlyn has been farming vegetables for 4 years and also earns additional income from general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested additional loan to further build her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds and farm supplies

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase stocks to sell like candies, chips, bread, and canned goods for her general store business.

Yolanda has been in this business for 5 years. Yolanda earns more income from pig fattening.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase stocks to sell like candies, chips, bread, and canned goods.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 42 years old and married with eight children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Editha is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Editha has been pig fattening for 8 years and also earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Jerilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of ten children, Jerilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell rice grains business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending and raising pigs. Jerilyn is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell for her business.

Jerilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 56 years old and married with two children, both are in school. Marilyn works very hard to provide for them.

Marilyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

Marilyn has been in this business for twenty years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, cooking oil, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Marilyn would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

loans.name: Analie

texts.en:
Analie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase materials for her fishing business. Analie has been in this business for three years. She earns more income from making fermented fish.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Rene Jonaz

texts.es:
Rene de 28 años de edad, es una persona muy esforzada y líder de la comunidad, estudio hasta 9° en la comunidad, el bachillerato no lo pudo realizar, porque había que retirarse hasta otro lugar y las condiciones económicas no le permitieron continuar, es por eso  que se dedica a trabajar  la agricultura a lado de su padre, desde muy corta edad, lo ha realizado. Él vive aún con sus padres y 2 sobrinos,   ya que son de edad avanzada y sus hermanos  están fuera del país y  han dejado  a su cargo el cuidado de los niños  y también de sus  padres.

Rene aprendió a cultivar, cuando su padre lo llevaba a la milpa, luego decidió hacer sus cultivos por aparte y probar suerte, gracias a Dios, expreso que le va muy bien, y que tiene mucha fuerza de trabajo por dar.

Con el préstamo podrá comprar 4 sacos de fertilizantes, una caneca de herbicidas, grano certificado e insecticidas para la siembra de maíz que ya pronto se acerca.


En el futuro desea realizar sus estudios pendientes,  para tener una opción de incorporarse al mundo  laboral y así darle  una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Rene is 28 years old and is a very determined person and community leader. He has a ninth grade education. He was unable to finish high school because he had to move to another location and his financial situation did not allow him to continue. For this reason, he works in agriculture along with his father which he has been doing since a young age. He lives with his aging parents and two nephews. His siblings are abroad and have left them in charge of caring for the children and his parents. 

Rene learned how to farm when his father brought him to the corn fields. He later decided to tend to his own crops and try his luck. Thanks to God, it went very well and he has a lot of strength to give his work. 

With this loan, he will be able to buy four sacks of fertilizer, a barrel of herbicides, a grain certification, and insecticides for corn planting in the near future. 

In the future, he hopes to finish his remaining school work to be have the option of entering the working world and to be able to give a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of fertilizer, one barrel of herbicides, grain certification, and insecticides for planting corn in the near future.

loans.name: Kamiljon

texts.ru:
У Камила большая семья. Он женат и вырастил троих детей. Ему  53 года. Этот энергичный человек любит 
свою семью, детей , землю на которой работает и которая дает ему пропитание.На жизнь Камил зарабатывает тем ,что  выращивает скот и перерабатывает молоко.Подросшие дети помогают Камилу в уходе за животными , а также они помогают обрабатывать землю, выращивать сад. Они тоже воспитаны на любви к природе и земле. Земледелие и выращивание скота это основные занятия жителей сельской местности. Также как и все жители села семья Камила тоже занимается этим исконно сельским трудом.Для того чтобы улучшить жилищные условия для своей семьи Камилу необходимо увеличить доходность своей семьи. В Этом году он хочет  приобрести мелкий рогатый скот, чтобы начав с малого повысить доходность своей семьи. Недостающую сумму 1000 сомони ему посоветовали взять в "Арванде" знакомые, которые пользовались услугами "Арванда" и остались довольны обслуживанием и удобством. Камил заранее благодарен за  поддержку.
texts.en: Kamil is 53, energetic, and has a large family. He is married and has three children. He loves his family and the land he works on that provides his livelihood. Kamil earns money by raising livestock and selling milk. His children help him care for the animals, cultivate the land, and plant in the garden. They were brought up to love the earth and nature. Animal husbandry and agriculture are the main occupations in rural populations and Kamil's whole village is involved in this age-old work. Kamil needs to increase his income in order to improve his family's living conditions. This year he would like to purchase small livestock to boost the family's income. He does not have the necessary 1,000 somoni, but his friends recommended that he take out a loan with Arvand based on their satisfaction with Arvand's services and convenience. Kamil is thankful for the support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Dúo Fución Group

texts.es: Dúo Fusión, representado por la señorita Irma Yolanda de 31 años soltera, Irma vende gas propano por cilindro desde hace dos años, vende de 5 a 6 al día y ahora necesita ya repartir a domicilio pues le piden que venda en las tortillerías, también tiene costurerita añade cortes típicos hace delantales en su tiempo libre, está feliz por los resultados y la ayuda que se le ha brindado, sueña en tener un local y trabajar junto con su hermano para que el reparta a domicilio el gas que le piden.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de gas propano y ropa tipica para la venta.
texts.en: Irma Yolanda, 31 years old, is a member of Dúo Fusión. She is single and has been selling propane gas by the canister for two years. She sells 5 or 6 per day and she needs to start doing deliveries, since businesses such as restaurants have started asking her to provide them with gas. She is also a seamstress and makes typical aprons in her spare time. She is happy with her success and grateful for the help she received. Her dream is to have a proper shop and to work together with her brother, the idea being that he would do the deliveries. She asks for a loan in order to buy propane gas and typical clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy propane gas and typical clothes to sell.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Riza works hard to support her family. She has a citrus-farming business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store and farming vegetables. 

Riza is borrowing PHP 15,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies for her citrus-farming business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Riza has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 42 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like soap, milk, sugar, eggs, noodles, etc.

Gina has borrowed and paid back 25 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 11 years and also earns an income from food vending and a butcher shop.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. Gina aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like soap, milk, sugar, eggs, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Marilou works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell rice grains business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store and raising pigs. 

Marilou is borrowing PHP 27,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell through her buy-and-sell rice grains business.

Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 26 years old and married with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional household goods to sell.

She has borrowed and paid back 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from buying and selling lobster and fish. Gina aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional household goods to sell.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Olivia works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Olivia is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy repair materials like plywood, paints, wood, bamboo, etc. for maintaining her fishing business.

Olivia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like plywood, paints, wood, bamboo, etc. for maintaining her fishing business.

loans.name: Reela

texts.en:
Reela is 34 years old and has a live-in partner with two children. With both children currently in school, Reela works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock like noodles, detergent soap, canned goods, sugar, etc. to sell.

Reela has been in this business for 8 years and sells a variety of items such as noodles, detergent soap, canned goods, sugar, etc. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stock like noodles, detergent soap, canned goods, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Lelyjean

texts.en:
Lelyjean works hard to support her family. Lelyjean is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, etc. In the future, Lelyjean would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, etc.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Gina works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling seaweeds.  She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. Gina hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en:
Dinah works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a sewing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years now.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business. Dinah would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business.

loans.name: Emeliana

texts.en:
Emeliana works hard to support her family. Emeliana is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Emeliana requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Emeliana has been in this business for 7 years now.

Emeliana would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania is a 61-year-old married woman with one child who is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Epifania has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Epifania requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Epifania has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Epifania would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a 49-year-old married woman with six children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Gemma has a buy and sell ready to wear clothing business in the Philippines. Gemma requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of ready to wear clothing to sell to her customers.

Gemma has been in this business for 10 years. Gemma would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of ready to wear clothing to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn works hard to support her family. Jenelyn is married and has a selling purchase order cards business in the Philippines.

Jenelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more purchase order cards to sell.

Jenelyn has been in this business for 2 years now.

In the future, Jenelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more purchase order cards to sell

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa works hard to support her family. Jesusa is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Jesusa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Jesusa has been in this business for 6 years now.

Jesusa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Leonora is 42 years old and has four children who are currently in school. In the picture, Leonora is posing with her son.

Leonora has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines. Leonora requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of purified drinking water to sell.

Leonora has been in this business for three years. In the future, Leonora would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more containers of purified drinking water to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria works hard to support her family. Maria is married and has a fruit-vending business in the Philippines.

Maria requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more fruits to sell.

Maria has been in this business for three years now.

Maria would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, rice, and vita palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Ligia Esthela

texts.es: Ligia tiene 29 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos de 12, 10, 4 y 2 años, el de 12 años asiste al colegio y los de 10, 4  se encuentran asistiendo  a la escuela, al igual como lo hizo en su primer prestamo, ella opto por incrementar su negocio ,el credito nuevo lo va a destinar a la compra y cria de ganado e insumos para el cuidado de los mismos , ella es una persona que ha demostrado mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad en su anterior prestamo y por ello Fodemi a decidido otorgale este credito sin duda alguna ya que va a ser muy bien utilizado, su anehelo mas grande en la vida es poder  tener casa propia  y asi poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y que terminen  sus estudios.
texts.en: Ligia is 29 years old and lives with her husband and their four children, who are aged 12, 10, 4, and 2. The 12-year-old goes to secondary school, and the following two go to primary school. She asks for a new loan for much the same purpose as the first one: to make her business grow. She will use the new loan to buy livestock and raise it, as well as to buy what she needs to care for it. She is a very responsible person, extremely punctual in her repayments, which is why Fodemi did not hesitate to grant her a new loan, confident that it would be put to good use. Ligia's greatest wish is to have a house of her own and thus give her children a better life and help them finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Sonia Orfa

texts.es: Sonia a sus 36 años de edad a dedicado casi  toda su vida a la agricultura, ella vive con su esposo que se dedica a la agricultura  y sus dos hijos el primero asiste a la escuela y el segundo se encuentra en el colegio, el nuevo  credito que fodemi le a aprobado sera destinado nuevamente a su negocio de siembra de papas enla compra de abonos y fungicidas, Sonia se ha caracterizado por ser una persona  alegre y positiva,ella dice que le va muy bien en su negocio ya que lo ha venido envidenciando a lo largo del tiempo, su objetivo en la vida es poder incrementar su negocio  para poder brindar a sus hijos el estudio que se merecen y asi poder verlos en un futuro siendo profesionales.
texts.en: Sonia is 36 years old and has been a farmer almost all her life. She lives with her husband, also a farmer, and they have two sons, one of whom goes to primary school, the other to secondary school. The new loan Fodemi granted her will be used, as the first one was, for her potato fields. She will buy manure and fungicide. Sonia is a cheery and positive person, who is confident that her business will keep being a success, as it has been up to now. Her goal in life is to improve it even further to be able to support her children through their studies in the way they deserve, so that they will learn a profession.

loans.use: to buy manure and fungicide.

loans.name: Gavhar

texts.ru:
Гавхар  занимается земледелием на протяжении многих лет. Это занятие исконно семейное . Её отцы и деды занимались земледелием   содержали свои семьи. Вот и Гавхар также с любовью относится  к труду на земле. Она не только получает материальный доход, но и положительную энергию от земли, на которой родилась и выросла.  Вот и своих детей она растит  на любви к земле и природе.
 Гавхар 37 лет, она замужем имеет троих детей. Конечно, как и всем родителям ей хотелось бы  чтобы дети получили образование и стали специалистами в сфере земледелия.   Но Гавхар кажется ,что эта мечта ее очень далека . Муж Гавхар на заработках в России. Он  стремится к тому, чтобы обеспечить семью всем необходимым для жизни.  Но здесь на Родине Гавхар не сидит сложа руки. 
Она хочет засеять свой небольшой участок  пшеницей. Для приобретения минеральных удобрений ей не хватает  финансов. Она рада , что может взять недостающую сумму  в «Арванде».
texts.en: Gavhar has been involved in farming for many years.  This has been the family's business historically.  Her father and grandfathers had been involved in farming and supported their families with this business.  And Gavhar also loves working on the land.  She not only receives a monetary benefit, but also positive energy from the land, where she was born and raised.  She is also raising her children to love the land and nature.  Gavhar is 37 years old, married and has three children.  Of course, just as do other parents, she wants her children to get an education and become specialists in farming.  But Gavhar thinks that this dream is far from reality.  Gavhar's husband works in Russia.  He strives toward providing the family with all of life's necessities, but Gavhar does not sit with her hands down here in their native land.  She wants to plant wheat on her small plot of land.  She does not have enough money to buy mineral fertilizers.  She is glad that she can borrow the needed amount from Arvand.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Eugenio De Jesús

texts.es: En su pueblo natal solo se le podía describir como un soñador, una persona que imaginaba un poco de mas, pues toda la vida había querido adquirir una finca la cual pudiera trabajar con cultivo y ganado, esta es la historia de Eugenio un hombre que alimentaba su espíritu con esperanza, un campesino que obtuvo sus conocimientos por parte de su padre quien lo entreno y lo preparo no solo para la vida del campo, si no para la vida cotidiana, que le enseño que no solo se vive de trabajo, que hay que alimentar su espíritu con sueños, trazarse metas, que una vida sin un propósito no tiene sentido, es así como  se le ocurrió tener una finca propia la cual pudiera cultivar los productos que quisiera, hoy gracias a su esfuerzo logro comprar un terreno el cual trabaja y es el sustento de su familia compuesta por su esposa y dos pequeños hijos, pero tiene un problema la falta de herramienta y semillas para aprovechar al 100 % su espacio hace que pierda ingresos y le genere perdidas por ende solicita un apoyo financiero para la compra de insumos, semillas y herramienta para la agricultura, que no ha podido adquirir por el alto costo de estos productos, ayudemos a este soñador de la vida a seguir con sus proyectos y ver hasta dónde llega el deseo y espíritu de un hombre
texts.en:
In his hometown, they could only describe him as a dreamer - a person who imagined a little bit more. All of his life he had wanted to acquire a farm where he could work with crops and livestock. This is the story of Eugenio - a man who nourishes his spirit with hope. He is a farmer who gained knowledge from his father who trained him. He not only prepared him for life in the fields, but for everyday life. He taught him to live not just for work, but to feed his spirit with dreams and to set goals because a life without purpose is meaningless. 

This is how he came to own a farm where he could grow the products he wanted. Thanks to his hard work, he was able to buy a plot of land where he works. It is the foundation of his family which includes his wife and two young children. However, he has a problem in that he lacks the tools and seeds needed to use 100% of his space and makes him lose revenue. This generated a request for financial support to buy supplies, seeds, and tools for agriculture that he has be unable to purchase due to the high cost of the products. Let us help his life dreamer to continue his projects and see where the dreams and spirit of a man lead.

loans.use: to buy tools, supplies, and seeds that he as been unable to attain due to high costs.

loans.name: José Angelmiro

texts.es:
El se llama José Angelmiro los planes a futuro es ser un buen mecánico y poder seguir avanzando en la carrera como profesional para poder emprender la propia empresa, más adelante quiere ayudar a la familia económicamente y enseñarle a las personas que no tienen recursos para entrar a un instituto o universidad para ayudarlo económicamente 

El necesita el convenio de kiva porque él no tiene ningún apoyo económico y le toca trabajar  para poder sostenerse y pagar un arriendo, estudio y demás, por eso es necesario el gran apoyo para seguir la carrera como mecánico y ser una persona agradecida.
texts.en:
This is José Angelmiro. His future plans include becoming a good mechanic and advancing his career as a professional by starting his own business. Going forward, he would like to help his family financially and demonstrate to people who cannot afford to enroll at an institute or university that it is possible to receive financial assistance.

José needs a Kiva loan because he does not have any other financial support. He needs to work in order to support himself and pay the rent, his tuition, and other expenses. It is necessary that he receive a strong amount of support so that he can continue pursuing his career as a mechanic. For this reason, he is a grateful individual.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a large amount of metal inventory to meet clients' orders on time

loans.name: Enhtsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Enhtsetseg is 30 years old and lives with her husband and two children in their apartment in Dundgovi province, Mongolia. Her husband, Nyamragchaa, runs an inter-province transportation service with his own car. Her sons are both under ten years old and attend local primary school and kindergarten, respectively. 

In 2011, Enhtsetseg started running her clothing store in a local market. She had been working in the field for a few years before she opened her store. She has gained a lot of experience and wishes to further expand her business. 

Enhtsetseg is now requesting a loan of MNT 3,000,000 to purchase a large clothing inventory to sell at her rental counter in the local market. She is a hard-working, positive, and responsible woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large clothing inventory to sell at her rental counter in the local market.

loans.name: Erdenesuh

texts.en:
Erdenesuh is 33 years old and lives with his wife in their small house in Dundgovi province, Mongolia. His wife Munhjargal is helping her husband with their family business. 
Erdenesuh had been running a small karaoke and bar business in rental space in the province center since 2006. He had changed his business into an animal pelt retail store for few years and now is trying to start his own cafe and karaoke business in rental space. He has lot of experience in the business and has already joined a network to help maintain his business. He is a hard-working and diligent man who is now requesting a loan of 8,500,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of meat and other food inventory to help his business succeed.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of meat and other food inventory to help business succeed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her children's university tuition and purchase clothing inventory to meet clients' order on time

loans.name: Gantsetseg

texts.en:
Gantsetseg is 32 years old, a single mother, and lives with her 2-year-old son in a Ger, a traditional nomadic yurt, in Arkhangai province, Mongolia. 
She has been selling used clothing in a rental stall at the local market for few years. She has been running the business while taking care of her son, to support her family and raise her child. She purchases clothing inventory three times a month and provides affordable used clothing to local residents. She is now requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of inventory to increase her sales and income. She is a diligent, hard-working, and strong woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of inventory toincrease her sales and income

loans.name: Resilita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Resilita works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell dried fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Resilita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell vegetables and spices business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years now.

She requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of vegetables and spices to sell. In the future, Violeta would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of vegetables and spices to sell.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 59 years old and married with eight children. Edna works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell, like shampoo, candies, biscuits, canned goods, juice and coffee, etc.

She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, candies, biscuits, canned goods, juice and coffee. In the future, Edna would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, like shampoo, candies, biscuits, canned goods, juice and coffee, etc.

loans.name: Nila

texts.en:
Nila is 48 years old, married and has six children, two currently in school.

Nila is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Nila requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock, feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

Nila has been raising livestock for eight years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Nila would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock, feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Resurreccion

texts.en:
Resurreccion is 48 years old and married with two children, one currently in school. Resurreccion works very hard to provide for them.

Resurreccion runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, bath soap, noodles, sugar, cereals, diapers, and sanitary napkins.

Resurreccion has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, bath soap, noodles, sugar, cereals, diapers, and sanitary napkins. 

In the future, Resurreccion would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell like canned goods, bath soap, noodles, sugar, cereals, diapers and sanitary napkins.

loans.name: Cleibeth

texts.es: Cleibeth de 25 años de edad,  habita al sur oriente de la ciudad, con su pequeño hijo menor de 3 años.  Desde hace 2 años emprendió su negocio, cuando quedó desempleada y debió generar otros ingresos que le ayudaran a ofrecer bienestar a su hijo, pues se había separado de su cónyuge. Cleibeth realiza dos tipos de negocios, por un lado alquila lavadora por horas y por otra parte, vende ropa femenina y masculina directamente a sus consumidores.  Sus ventas las realiza de contado y a crédito, todos los días desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde. Sus compras las realiza de contado en municipios cercanos y en el comercio minorista de Barranquilla a quien le ofrezca un mejor precio.. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  ropas para damas, relojes, pantalones y mercancías variadas, que han solicitado sus clientes. Su meta mas adelante es tener su propia casa, pues paga arriendo y necesita tener estabilidad, para su pequeño hijo que está en crecimiento.
texts.en: Cleibeth is 25 years old and lives in the southwest of the city with her little boy, aged 3. She started her business 2 years ago, when she lost her job and had to find another source of income in order to support her child, since she separated from her husband. Cleibeth has two businesses. The first consists in renting out a washing machine by the hour. The second one is retail: she sells women's and men's clothing directly to the customers. She sells both cash and on credit and works every day from 9 in the morning to 4 in the afternoon. She buys her merchandise cash from nearby towns and in the retail shop of Barranquilla, depending on who offers the best deals. She is asking for her first loan in order to buy women's clothing, watches, trousers, and other items which her customers asked for. Her goal for the future is to have a house of her own, since having to pay rent is detrimental to the financial stability her growing little boy needs.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Laura Victoria

texts.es: Laura y su cónyuge siempre trabajan unidos pensando en un futuro mejor,   su experiencia  en este oficio, es su mayor fortaleza.  De esta manera los clientes  están muy satisfechos, y son principalmente sus vecinos quienes le compran, llegando al local ubicado en su propia vivienda en busca de los más deliciosos productos, como  empanadas, arepas, buñuelos, sopa, chicha de maíz etc. Sus compras las realiza en graneros del sector, que le ofrecen precios competitivos y les resulta más cómodo comprar. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará un horno, una estufa, una nevera y vitrinas. Con esta inversión planea incrementar su producción y estaría ofreciendo una mejor calidad en el servicio y en los productos. Su meta familiar es comprar una vivienda, pero es también un gran desafío lograr los recursos para lograr su sueño de prosperidad. Para ello se propone expandir su actividad y genera mas ingresos y poco a poco lograr su sueño deseado.
texts.en: Laura and her partner work together, always thinking of a better future. Their experience in this business is their greatest strength, therefore, their customers are very satisfied. It is mostly their neighbors who are their customers. The customers arrive at their business, which is located in their home, in search of delicious products such as empanadas, arepas, donuts, soup, corn chicha, and more. She makes her purchases in the farmer's market which offers competitive prices and she is more comfortable buying there. Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will buy an oven, a stove, refrigerator, and cabinets. She plans to increase her production with this investment, offering better quality service and products. Her goal is to buy a home for her family but it is also a great challenge to get all of the resources to achieve her dream of prosperity. She wants to expand her business and generate more income to gradually achieve her desired dream.

loans.use: to purchase an oven, stove, refrigerator, and cabinets

loans.name: Luis Yair

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Luis, quien con su cedikiva aumentó el número de gafas, camisas, hebillas, billeteras etc. y las vendió. Sus inventarios se incrementaron y obtuvo una mayor liquidéz para rotar sus mercancias. Luis dice a sus fianciadores , que está muy agradecido con Kiva y con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, y pide que lo sigan apoyando, para continuar fortaleciendo su negocio. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo finacimiento, mediante el cual comprará mercancia variada, como gafas, billeteras y accesorios. Con ello aumentará su capital una vez mas, y tendrá nuevas utilidades para ofrecer precios justos a los clientes, que pasan por su punto de contacto comercial y siempre compran.
texts.en: Thank you for supporting Luis. With his Kiva loan, he increased the number of glasses, shirts, buckles, wallets, and more that he sold. His inventories increased and he had more assets to rotate his merchandise. Luis tells his lenders that he is grateful to Kiva and Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and asks to continue their support to further strengthen his business. He is currently applying for a new loan to buy various merchandise such as glasses, wallets, and accessories. This will increase his capital once again and he will have new features to offer fair prices to customers that pass though his business location and always buy.

loans.use: to purchase various merchandise such as sunglasses, wallets, and accessories

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Luz con su credikiva, mediante el cual compró una computadora y un play statión. Por esta inversión hoy tienen un nuevo negocio y nuevos ingresos. En la actualidad está aplicando aun credikiva, mediante el cual comprará un televisor, un computador un play statión y por otro lado también comprará víveres para surtir su tienda. Su vida ha mejorado y la satisfacción de su familia también. En su mensaje de agradecimiento pide que la sigan apoyando para crecer y mejorar su vida y la de su grupo familiar.
texts.en: Luz is grateful for the support she received in the form of a previous loan, which helped her to buy a computer and a games console. Thanks to this investment, her shop now offers more services and generates new income. She asks for a new loan in order to buy a television, a computer, and a games console, as well as merchandise to replenish her shop's stock. Her life and her family's happiness have both improved. She reiterates her thanks and asks for continued support so that she can keep improving her business as well as her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a television, a computer, a games console, as well as merchandise to replenish her shop's stock.

loans.name: Angie Jamileth

texts.es:
Angie es una joven de 19 años, vive en casa de sus padres en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, ciudad conocida por ser muy comercial y productiva, con un clima cálido húmedo.
Angie es una señorita muy trabajadora, desde que terminó el colegio ella decidió trabajar, hace un año se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa interior, recorre visitando a sus clientes de casa en casa, ha podido ya ganarse clientela por la atención que ella les brinda.
Angie ahora necesita un pequeño crédito para poder capitalizarse, aprovechar y comprar los productos en oferta ya que se acerca un buen mes para incrementar sus ventas. Acudió a Fundación Alternativa por buenas referencias del sector y pudo obtener el crédito que necesitaba ya que en otras instituciones no le permitían por su edad, está muy feliz y agradecida con la institución y el proyecto Kiva porque hará posible que ella crezca con su negocio.
texts.en: Angie is 19 years old and lives with her parents in the town of Santo Domingo, known for its businesses, its productivity, and its hot and humid climate. Angie is a very hard-working young lady who decided to start her business as soon as she finished secondary school. She has been selling cosmetics and undergarments for one year. She sells door-to-door and already has a loyal customer base thanks to her good service. Angie needs a small loan in order to increase her capital so as to take advantage of special offers to buy products ahead of a month that she expects will be good for sales. She approached Fundación Alternativa because it came with good references in the microfinance sector. She was able to obtain the loan she needed there, whereas she was refused in other lending institutions because of her age. She is very happy and grateful for the help received, both from the institution and from Kiva, since it will enable her to grow with her business.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy new merchandise,

loans.name: Fermín De Jesús

texts.es: El señor Fermín había dedicado gran parte de su vida al campo oficio en el que no tuvo éxito puesto que le genero múltiples perdías hasta el punto de terminar con su  cultivo, preocupado por su estabilidad económica El señor Fermín decidió montar una salsamentaría en la cual se enfocaría en vender bebidas alcohólicas negocio que ha tenido durante 6 años, Fermín es un hombre sin hijos, es una persona que vive únicamente con su esposa, que  tiene un problema en contra y es el tiempo, debido a que  necesita establecer un negocio que pueda perdurar en el tiempo ya que no tendrá quien les ayude económicamente en un futuro por esto requiere un préstamo para comprar surtido y darle cancelación a su crédito anterior para seguir prosperando con el pasar de los años.
texts.en: Fermín was a farmer for several years, but suffered great losses and had to quit. Worried about his financial stability, he set up a bar where he would sell mainly alcohol. He has had this business for six years. Fermín and his wife live together but have no children. They are racing against time to set up a stable business that will support them in their old age. This is why he asks for a loan in order to buy merchandise and to repay his previous loan, so as to keep prospering with the years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as drinks and sweets and to repay his previous loan.

loans.name: Alvaro Javier

texts.es: Javier es un chico de 19 años, vive con su padre y sus 3 hermanas, se ha estado dedicando ultimamente  a la agricultura desde hace 2 años junto a su padre, javier se identifica como un joven  positivo en cuanto a su personalidad como la mayoria de los chicos, el credito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y fungicidas para sus cultivos de papas, Javier comenta que  le va muy bien en esta actividad y desea mucho incrementarla  para asi poder obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida, y de ser posible le gustaria retomar sus estrudios.
texts.en: Javier is a young man of 19 years. He lives with his father and 3 sisters. He recently began working in agriculture two years ago with his father. Javier is characterized by being a positive young man, as are most boys' personalities. He is going to invest this loan in the purchase of fertilizer and fungicides for his crops of potatoes. Javier says that he is doing very well in this activity and he wants to increase it very much so he can earn more income and improve his quality of life. If possible, he'd like to resume his studies.

loans.use: to purchase fungicide and fertilizer for his potato crops.

loans.name: Esmilda

texts.es:
El exquisito olor a limpio, los productos ordenados y la amabilidad característica de Esmilda, es lo que día a día motiva a los clientes a entrar a su pequeña pulpería. Ella tiene 45 años de edad y es madre soltera. Hace un año estableció su negocio, fue motivada por su mamá, quien le ha enseñado a ganarse el pan de cada día de manera honrada. Es una mujer emprendedora y disciplinada, lucha por el futuro próspero de sus dos hijos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la construcción de un servicio sanitario que presente las mejores condiciones higiénicas en su hogar. Su preocupación principal es ofrecerle a su familia una vida saludable, para que de esta manera sus hijos tengan un buen desarrollo en sus estudios y el ámbito social. Una de sus metas es seguir invirtiendo en su pequeña pulpería, anhela seguir trabajando para cumplir su sueño, expandir su negocio y lograr establecer una distribuidora, lo que le proporcione una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The exquisite smell of cleanliness, the products all arranged, and Esmilda's typical friendliness are what motives her customers to go to her small grocery store day after day.  Esmilda, 45, is a single mother.  She started her business a year ago, motivated by her mother, who taught her how to earn an honest living.  She's an enterprising and disciplined woman who is striving for her children to have a prosperous future.

She's requesting the loan to build a bathroom that has the best hygienic conditions for her home.  Her main concern is giving her family a healthy life so her children develop academically as well as socially.

One of Esmilda's goals is to continue investing and working in her small grocery store so she can realize her dream of expanding her business and setting up a distributorship, which will give her greater economic stability.

loans.use: to build a bathroom

loans.name: Rosa Aminta

texts.es:
Rosa de 46 años de edad,  con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo le pudieron dar que cursara hasta un 8º grado, luego empezó a trabajar para ayudar a sus padres y hermanos menores al pasar los años se caso y procrearon 4 hijos y todos estan acompañados solo una tiene a su cargo; pero esta trabajando para ayudarla a los gastos familiares, ya que su esposo la abandono hace varios años y tuvo que tomar la responsabilidad de la familia.


ella se dedica a la compra y posterior venta de verduras en el mercado, muy temprano sale de su casa para tomar el autobús que la lleva al mercado donde tiene su puesto de venta, esto lo realiza por las mañanas ya que a la medio día sale nuevamente el autobús que la lleva a su casa y no regresa tiene que aprovechar y tratar de vender todo el producto por la mañana y por la tarde se dedica a cuidar animales de granja, su hija quien trabaja en una institución quien le aporta  para los gastos familiares.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar verduras, ya que no le es suficiente para cubrir la demanda de la cliente.

Ella seguirá trabajando y ayudara a su hija , ya que tiene la necesidad de seguir estudiando y por la condición económica familiar no lo ha hecho.
texts.en:
Rosa is 46 years old.  Through much effort and hard work, they were able to give her the opportunity to attend school until eighth grade.  Then she began working to help her parents and younger siblings. Over the years, she married and had four children.  All are in common-law relationships and only one is in her care.  But she is working to help her with the family expenses because her husband left her several years ago and she had to take responsibility for the family.

Rosa is engaged in purchasing vegetables for later sale at the market.  She leaves her home very early to take the bus to the market where she has her sales stand.  She makes this trip in the mornings since she catches the bus home again at noon.  She doesn’t go back, so she has to take advantage and try to sell all of her products in the morning.  In the afternoon, she is engaged in caring for farm animals.  Her daughter works at an institution and contributes to the family expenses.

She is requesting the loan to purchase vegetables because she doesn’t have enough to meet customer demand.  She will keep working and supporting her daughter because she needs to continue studying and hasn’t been able to do so because of the family’s financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables.

loans.name: Tanzania Group

texts.en:
Sikudhani is in her mid 30s and is married with two children who are at school. She is from Tujijenge Tanzania. For four years now, Sikudhani has had a mamalishe business selling food. She starts working at 6 a.m. and continues to 5 p.m. every working day and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This is her first loan request which she will use to buy food cooking ingredients (maize flour, baking flour, cooking oil). She dreams of building a house and improving her family's life. Sikudhani will share this loan with her loan group “TANZANIA” which totals two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy food cooking ingredients (maize flour, baking flour, cooking oil).

loans.name: Rosa Escarleth

texts.es:
Rosa de 33 años de edad, casada con tres hijos, bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios de Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadores, responsables con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad lucha día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de mercadería en general como pantalones, shores, faldas, blusas, ropa de cama, ropa interior, piyamas. Ella dedica a su negocio unas  diez horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. Actividad que la desempeña en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante. Rosa agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Rosa, 33, is married and has 3 children under her care. They are from Leon, in the western part of the country, and they are hard-working, responsible people, with a desire to get ahead in life. Unfortunately, she was unable to get a degree due to lack of resources, and had to work from an early age to help with the household expenses. Now she fights every day to provide a better future for her children.
Thanks to her determination to get ahead, she runs a business selling general merchandise such as pants, shorts, skirts, blouses, bed linen, underwear and pajamas. She works around 10 hours per day offering her products from home and as a street vendor.
Rosa is grateful to Kiva lenders for helping people with low incomes in poor countries such as Nicaragua to have decent jobs.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her clothing business with items such as pants, shorts, skirts, blouses, bed linen, underwear, pajamas, etc.

loans.name: Altantsetseg

texts.en:
Altantsetseg is a 47-year-old borrower from Arkhangai province, Mongolia. Her daughters are studying at university.
Altantsetseg has been running her organic dairy products retail business successfully for the last few years. She has been providing a decent living for her family and paying education fees for her children. She is now requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase organic dairy products from herders in large amount to sell to local residents and make a small profit. She is a hard-working, well-experienced and friendly woman.

loans.use: to purchase organic dairy products from herders in large amounts to sell to local residents.

loans.name: Mary

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Mary quien con su credikiva pudo comprar productos naturales que ubicó en su estantería y vendió rápidamente, sus ventas se incrementaron y así mismo sus utilidades. Ella dice a sus financiadores de Kiva: “ Muchas gracias por participar en el cumplimiento de  los sueños personales”. Hoy está aplicando aun nuevo financiamiento mediante el cual comprará productos naturales para el estrés, productos nutritivos y alimenticios en general.  Con esta inversión una vez mas tendrá nuevas ventas y nueva rotación.
texts.en: Thank you for supporting Mary.  With her Kiva loan, she was able to purchase natural products, which started off on her shelf and sold very quickly.  Her sales increased and, likewise, her profits.  To her Kiva financial backers, she says, “Thank you very much for participating in the fulfillment of my personal dreams”.  Today she is applying for yet another loan through which she will purchase natural products for stress, nutritional products, and general foods.  With this investment, she will once again have new sales and new stock rotation.

loans.use: to purchase natural products for stress, nutritional products, and general foods.

loans.name: Gladys Aracely

texts.es: Gladys, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Gladys tiene su propio negocio desde hace 5 años donde vende productos como arroz, azúcar, manteca, frijoles, harina, cereal, verdura, condimentos y otros. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 lempiras para surtir de productos como harina, manteca, refrescos, verduras, arroz, etc. para mantener suficiente inventario de productos y mantener mas clientela. Su plan es crecer como microempresaria y tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
Gladys is 35 years old, and she is a single mother with two children. She lives in the municipality of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Gladys has had her own store for 5 years, where she sells products such as rice, sugar, butter, beans, flour, cereal, vegetables, condiments, and similar items. 

She is requesting a loan of 15,000 Lempiras in order to stock her store with products such as flour, butter, soft drinks, vegetables, rice, etc., so that she can maintain enough inventory and provide for more customers. Her plan is to grow as a micro entrepreneur, and to have a big store.

loans.use: to purchase products such as flour, butter, soft drinks, vegetables, rice, etc.

loans.name: Ancristel Tatiana

texts.es:
La salud de las personas y la culminación de sus estudios, son los objetivos principales para Ancristel, por lo que decidió estudiar Farmacia. Tiene 21 años de edad, está soltera y cursa quinto año de la carrera. Es una joven carismática, inteligente y emprendedora. Para ella, cada día es la oportunidad de adquirir más conocimientos, su sueño es ser una excelente farmacéutica. Está muy agradecida con su padre, quien ha sido su principal apoyo. 
Solicita el financiamiento para pagar la matrícula y las mensualidades correspondientes a este año 2014. Ella deposita su confianza en el préstamo que brinda Kiva y MiCrédito, puesto que no se atrasará en las clases que recibe, ya que al no pagar a tiempo le reprograman los exámenes, lo que sería un obstáculo en su profesionalización. Una de sus metas es trabajar en lo que se especializa y lograr abrir una farmacia, anhela un futuro brillante y lleno de posibilidades.
texts.en:
