Claudia Verónica tiene 40 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad ubicada cerca al valle del río Jequetepeque, lo que le ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores patos, cuyes y cerdos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para la compra de materiales para construir sus corrales para una mejor distribución de los mismos.
texts.en:
Claudia Verónica is 40 and lives in the district of Zaña.  This community is located near the Jequetepeque River Valley, which has allowed it to develop its agriculture, including livestock, and commerce.  It is in the Chiclayo province, part of the Lambayeque region of northern coastal Peru.  

Claudia Verónica raises and sells small production animals: ducks, guinea pigs, and pigs.  Her business is located at the back of her home.  She has requested a loan of 3,000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy nutritious feed to fatten her animals, and secondly to buy materials for building pens so she can distribute them better.

loans.use: to buy nutritious feed to fatten her animals

loans.name: Nilgün

texts.en:
Nilgün, age 32, is a young, single entrepreneur. Nilgün has sold the Farmasi brand of cosmetics for two years. Before she started selling them, she used them herself; since she liked them, she kept ordering them. Then her friends and family asked her to place orders for them, so she began selling them herself. Over the last two years she has always found new customers. With a loan from Maya, she wants to buy these products wholesale because she spends a lot buying products. She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial individual and would like to open a store to sell these products.   

The above was translated from Turkish by Maya Staff. Please see the Turkish below. 
Nilgün Hanım, 32 yaşında bekar genç bir girişimci.  Nilgün Hanım, 2 yıl önce tanıştığı Farmasi marka kozmetik ürünlerini satıyor.  Bu ürünleri satmadan önce kendisi kullanmaya başlıyor.  Ürünlerden memnun kalınca sürekli sipariş vermeye başlıyor.  Bu ürünleri duyan yakın çevreside sipariş vermeye başlayınca Nilgün Hanım ürünleri kendisi satmaya başlıyor.  2 yılda bu ürünleri kullanan sürekli müşterileri oluşuyor.  Maya'dan aldığı kredi ile bu ürünleri toptan almayı amaçlıyor.  Çünkü çok mal alınca primi artıyor.  Çalışkan ve girişken birisi olan nilgün hanım bu ürünleri sattığı bir dükkan açmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase and run two Fresh Life Toilets

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is an experienced business lady working in Nairobi. She currently works as a treasurer for one of the estates in Nairobi. She seeks a loan on behalf of her estate to help them purchase and run one Fresh Life Toilet. The main aim of purchasing this toilet for the estate is that it may enhance the sanitation standards in the compound. The toilet will mainly be used by the guards and casual workers who will work at the estate. 

Josephine hopes that the toilet will create high sanitation standards and, in turn, attract more tenants to reside at the estate. The toilet will also reduce the risk of an outbreak of sanitation related diseases at the estate.

loans.use: to purchase and run one Fresh Life Toilet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase and run one Fresh Life Toilet

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es:
Herminia de 55 años de edad, no estudio, tiene cuatro hijos pero ya formaron su propia familia y viven separados, ella está acompañada y solo ella y su pareja viven en casa.  

Ella posee una tienda y un molino desde hace aproximadamente 6 años de tener estos 2 negocios. Junto con su compañero de vida decidieron poner este negocio por la necesidad que existía en la comunidad de un molino y una tienda y su compañero de vida en su tiempo libre trabaja con ella.

El dinero lo utilizara para la compra de un nuevo motor para el molino y el que poseen actualmente lo han reparado en varias ocasiones y le sigue dando problemas por eso compraran uno nuevo, la molida de maíz la inician de 8:00 am y la tienda de 7 de la mañana hasta 6:00 de la tarde.    


En el futuro ellos lo que tienen planeado es ir creciendo en los clientes para el molino, como para la tienda y a si mejorar sus ingresos económicos y ellos saben muy bien que esto depende mucho del buen servicio que brinden a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Herminia, age 55, never went to school. She has four children who now have their own families and live apart from her. She and her partner live in their home together. 

She runs a store and a mill, and has had these two businesses for about six years. She and her partner decided to start these businesses since there was a need in the area for both a mill and a store.  Her partner works with her in his spare time.

They will use the money to purchase a new motor for their mill. The one they currently have has been repaired a number of times, but still gives them problems, so it's time to buy a new one. They start running the corn mill at 8:00 am and open the store at 7:00 am, both business running until 6 o'clock at night.

Their plans for the future are to continue increasing their customer base for the mill and for the store, improving their economic income. They know that this will depend upon their ability to provide their customers with good service.

loans.use: buy a new motor for her corn mill

loans.name: Komi

texts.fr: Homme de 35ans, Mr Komi pour assurer son rôle de père de famille revend depuis 2009 des chaussures dans un marché de la ville de Lomé, lieu où il s'approvisionne également. Son second crédit qu'il sollicite de WAGES lui servira de s'approvisionner en marchandises afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Il espère ouvrir à l'avenir une boutique et assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille. Marié à une couturière, ils ont ensemble un enfant en charge.
texts.en:
A 35-year old husband and father, Komi lives in Lomé with his seamstress wife and their dependent child. To fulfill his responsibilities as the father of the family, he has been selling shoes at a market in the city of Lomé since 2009, which is also where he purchases his supplies.

Komi is seeking his second loan from WAGES in order to purchase the merchandise necessary to meet his customer demand. He hopes to someday open a shop and ensure the food self-sufficiency of his family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for resale.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 40-years-old and lives in the town of Tororo in the Mbale region of Uganda. She is married and has five children who are all currently in school. For the past 13 years, Betty has been working hard to manage her school, which provides education services. 

To help expand her business, Betty has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to build a new classroom block, and will help Betty to generate greater profits and improve the school. Betty hopes that in the future she will be able to educate her children. 

Betty is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs, like Betty, who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: build a new class room block

loans.name: Maria Felipa

texts.es: Doña Maria se encuentra muy feliz y muy satisfecha ya que gracias a los inversionistas en la plataforma KIVA en alianza con la cooperativa COMIXMUL ella invirtió su financiamiento en pago de mano de obra para limpieza y corte del grano y otra parte abonar y foliar sus cultivos de café. Gracias a este financiamiento ella considera fue una puerta que se abrió en el momento justo; porque estaba en condiciones preocupantes para darle el ultimo mantenimiento a su plantación de café lo cual permitió fortalecerla más, dándole una última abonada a sus cultivos ya que era necesario y que por falta de capital no lo había hecho ya que algunas bodegas y demás personas que son prestamistas lo hacen con una tasa de interés del 8% y hasta un 10% mensual eso depende de la necesidad del solicitante aprovechándose de ello. Muy agradecida con Dios primeramente por permitirle acceder a dichos fondos pues ella pudo salir con su compromiso y nuevamente ella solicita un segundo financiamiento el cual le permitirá invertir en la plantación ya que después de la recolecta del grano la planta quedo débil y expuesta desatendidas y sucia estando más propensa a ser afectada por la roya, plagas y los diferentes cambios climáticos.
texts.en: Doña Maria is so happy and grateful to the KIVA investors, working with the COMIXMUL cooperative. She invested her previous financing in paying labor to get her fields cleaned and the coffee beans harvested, as well as fertilizing her crops. Thanks to this financing, she feels that she was able to open a door just at the right time; she was worried that she might not be able to take care of the last of the maintenance that her coffee crop needed. She needed to give it a final fertilizer treatment, but she didn't have enough capital for it. Stores and other lenders were charging 8% interest, and even up to 10% monthly interest, depending on the need of the person taking advantage of it.  She is grateful to God first and foremost for bringing her out of these depths as she was able to meet her commitments. She is requesting a new loan which she will invest in strengthening her crops. After the harvest, the plant remains weak and exposed. If left ignored it is more likely to be affected by rot, disease and climate changes.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies for growing coffee next season.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 44 years old and lives in Map-an, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with two children who are now adults. 

Lolita has been engaged in a hog fattening business for ten years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP during each harvesting and selling period of the pigs. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing eight sacks of booster and grower feed for her hog fattening business. 

Lolita has been a member of PMPC for almost three years. In the future, Lolita hopes to expand her hog fattening business.

loans.use: to purchase eight sacks of booster and grower feed for her hog fattening business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase clothing at wholesale

loans.name: Jelly

texts.en:
Jelly is 54-years-old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with two children, one of whom is an adult and the other is a teenager. 

Jelly and her husband have been engaged in a beef and meat vending business for 10 years already and earn approximately PHP 5,000 each month for doing this type of business. She has requested a loan to purchase one cow to butcher and sell every Sunday.  Jelly has been a member of PMPC for almost six years. In the future, Jelly hopes to expand their beef and meat vending business.

loans.use: to purchase one cow to butcher and sell

loans.name: Najil

texts.en:
Najil is 37 years old and lives in Palilan, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children now at their school age. 

Najil has a little store and sells groceries and other consumable products. She has been doing this business for four years and earns approximately 7,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. Najil is also receiving monthly support from her husband, who is a seaman. 

Najil has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional groceries and other consumable products for resale. 

Najil has been a member of PMPC for almost nine years. In the future, Najil hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for resale.

loans.name: Jhona

texts.en:
Jhona is 62 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has two adult children.

For the past three years, Jhona has been engaging in pig farming. She earns approximately PHP 3,000.00 during each farming season. She is requesting a loan to purchase two sacks of feed for her hogs.  

Jhona has been a member of PMPC for twelve years. In the future, Jhona hopes to expand her pig farming business.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of feed

loans.name: Claudio

texts.en:
Claudio is 61 years old and lives with a live-in partner. He resides in Brgy. Villaba, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental.

Currently, he is earning an income from a charcoal business. 

Claudio is a new member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). He is applying for 50,000 PHP to pay for housing materials for house building. 

He is trusting PMPC as he has joined the institution and is obtaining loan.

loans.use: to pay for housing materials for house building
